choices: Wait a while to tell her parents...wanting to keep the baby.

111.content:
Harper groaned, in her bathroom, she was currently bent double over the toilet, having thrown up nothing but bile that saturday morning, a sign of something she really didn't want to be true as she wiped her mouth, feeling horrible as she looked over to a small box, slowly picking the pregnancy test up and taking a deep breath as she opened it.

A few tense minutes later, the blonde haired girl could only sit on her toilet in shock, looking at the positive test with fear, for starters, wondering just what her mother was going to say, and secondly, wondering who the hell it was who'd done the deed as she began to wash up, before going back to bed with a groan, her hand going to her pudgy belly as she Just imagined what it was going to look like in a few months, closing her eyes and going back to sleep.

When Harper next awoke, she saw from her bedside clock that it was 10:00am, as good a time as any to get up she thought as she slowly dragged herself from her bed, yawning and putting on her silk night gown, before going downstairs, hearing the television on as her parents sat watching one of the many soaps they subscribed to, Harper's awakening making them look to the door and smile.

"Good morning sweetie, sleep well?" her father asked her, smiling as Harper slowly went and sat down in the big armchair of their livingroom, yawning into her hand. "Ooooooh...yeah, I slept fine Dad" she said giving a sleepy smile to her parents as she lay back against the armchair, relaxing as the confession she wanted to give bounced around in her mind like an agitated ping pong ball.

"Is there something wrong Harper?" Her mother asked, making her look up, before smiling. "O-Oh no, of course not Mom, just a bit tired from last night." she said, having been going to quite a few parties recently...probably the reason she was pregnant to begin with actually, but oh well.

Thinking about her situation, Harper decided she wanted to...
111.title: Pregnancy

1112.content:
"I'm fine. Promise." Harper said, smiling as her mother shot her a look that said she didn't believe her, but Harper determinedly returned her mother's gaze.

"If you say so." Her mother replied before returning her attention to the television.

Harper sighed to herself and sagged back into the armchair as she blinked a few times. She wasn't quite ready to tell her parents about her late night discovery. No, it was better if they didn't know yet.

Harper's stomach let out a low growl as she felt her belly twisting with hunger. Her parents glanced at her momentarily as she got to her feet, the armchair creaking slightly as she stood. She walked behind the couch, biting her lip as she passed the picture of Jesus hanging on the wall.

She couldn't help but cast her eyes to the floor, feeling her stomach fluttering from more than just hunger. She kept her eyes down until she was out of the living room and into the short hall that lead towards the kitchen.

She ran her fingers along one of the walls as she walked, feeling the cool paint beneath them sliding easily under her touch. Her feet padded silently on the beige carpet as she continued into the brightly lit kitchen.

The room was fairly large, though that was more because it was the kitchen and dining room together. A worn counter divided the kitchen area from the dining area like a lone white finger extending into the middle of the pale wooden floor. The floor had probably been a darker brown at one point, but years of use had long since faded and colored it, especially along the path from the door to the fridge and around the old table. The table was in desperate need of being refinished, though Harper's father always used the excuse that the weather wasn't right whenever her mother brought it up.

Harper made her way towards one of the cupboards, throwing it open as she scanned the contents. She removed her hand from her belly, realizing she'd been rubbing it, and grabbed a couple of individually wrapped cupcakes. She tore into the plastic which crackled and ruffled in her hands before shoving the whole cupcake into her mouth and biting into the sweet sugary treat. She tossed the empty wrapper onto the counter, as she continued scanning the contents of the cupboard.

"You really should be careful about how much junk food you've been eating lately. It's starting to show."

Harper jumped, spinning to spot her mother entering the kitchen. She took a deep breath as she tried to get her heart under control, "Don't sneak up on people like that!"

"Sorry sweetie, I'm just worried about how much sugar you've been eating lately."

Harper finished swallowing the first cupcake and opened the second as she returned her attention to the cupboard, "I'm fine. I'm just a little bloated."

Harper didn't even have to look to know the look that her mother was giving her, but she wasn't really in the mood for a debate right now. She was starving and these cupcakes weren't near enough. She reached up and grabbed a box of cereal and another cupcake. Stepping around her mother, she placed the cereal box on the counter and watched as her mother just shook her head and made her way back towards the living room before the commercials were over.

Harper rolled her eyes, waiting until her mother had left before shoving the third cupcake into her mouth. Her mother had been dropping not so subtle hints about Harper's slight belly lately, and it was really starting to annoy her. Still, she should probably get used to it since it was just going to keep getting bigger. Though then her mother would probably be having a different conversation than just complaining about her daughter's weight gain.

She scoffed slightly as she glanced at the empty wrappers on the counter, then to the cupboard which was loaded with treats and other goodies. She really wasn't looking forward to that conversation. Though, if her mother thought she was just gaining weight, she might be able to delay it for a few more months. Still, that would mean trying to gain weight to hide her pregnancy and she wasn't sure she was fond of that idea. However, she probably would be putting on weight anyway with the pregnancy and this could give her an excuse to indulge herself without feeling too guilty.

Harper smiled and grabbed another cupcake, shoving it into her mouth. Honestly, being pregnant might not be that bad she thought to herself as she poured herself a large bowl of sugary cereal. She could get used to this.
1112.title: Wait a while to tell her parents...wanting to k...

choices: Show restraint and go to dance class
Pretend to go to class and go out eating instead
Complain her clothes are too small, and say she needs to go to the mall
Give into her gluttonous desires and stay home.
11121.content:
Harper moaned in pleasure as she rubbed her hard belly with one hand, while shoving another cupcake into her mouth with the other. She adjusted herself on her bed, causing several of the wrappers that surrounded her to to crinkle. A rapping on her door, brought her back to reality as she jumped slightly.

"Just remember you have dance practice in an hour," her mother's voice said through the door, "I hope you haven't been overeating on snacks again. You really are starting to get a little on the chubby side."

Harper rolled her eyes as she waited for her mother to leave. After a few moments, she brought herself to a sitting position amidst the pile of wrappers that surrounded her. She could feel her belly touching the top of her thighs as she shoved another cupcake into her mouth.

Her mother wasn't wrong, she thought as she got off her bed. She stepped in front of the large mirror in her room, taking in her new body. Her belly had almost tripled in size, however, she would hardly call that an accomplishment with how small it had been before. Her arms and legs were also thicker and she was developing a nice double chin.

She hadn't really planned on gaining weight this quickly, but she couldn't help herself when it came to all the sugary foods she was enjoying. Still, she was worried that her mom might make her go on a diet soon if she kept gaining as fast as she was. She was hoping that maybe going to dance classes again would help slow her gain down, and hide her pregnancy from her overprotective parents. At least for a little while.

She gave a twirl in the mirror, admiring how tight her clothes were starting to look on her expanding frame. Her jeans were unbuttoned, as she didn't like how tightly they cut into her waist, and her shirt was starting to conform to her expanding belly. There was still room to grow though, she thought as she noticed that the fabric wasn't completely form fitting.

She made her way back to her bed and grabbed a cookie from an almost empty box. She closed her eyes, savoring the flavor as she shoved it into her mouth. She just couldn't seem to stop eating these sugary treats. She glanced at her dance clothes laid over the back of a chair. She really didn't feel like going to class right now, she just wanted to keep eating. In just the last week her appetite had grown significantly. She had kept telling herself that she was eating for two now, but that had just turned into a slippery slope and left her eating more and more at every meal.

She strode over to the chair with her dance clothes, loving the feeling of her belly bouncing slightly with each step as she stripped out of her t-shirt and jeans. She hadn't worn her dance clothes in a couple weeks, since they had been on a break, but now she was going to have to go every night after school, and Saturdays.

She let out a big sign and began to ease herself into the tight outfit, wincing as she tried to squeeze it around her chubby belly. It was incredibly tight, and though the pants stretched easily around her growing butt and thighs, her shirt was struggling to contain her growing belly.

She felt way too restricted in these clothes, but all her other pairs were the same size. She really would need to get some new clothes if she was going to keep getting fatter. Though, even if she didn't, she would need new clothes eventually with her pregnant belly.

Harper smiled to herself. Maybe her mother would let her skip class tonight if she told her that she needed to go get new dance clothes. That would be admitting to her mother that she was getting chubby, but at least it would give her an excuse to go eat some food while she was shopping. Still, she could always pretend she was going to dance class and just go get some food, and use that excuse on Monday.

She glanced at the chubby girl in the mirror. She hadn't really wanted to get super fat anyway though, so maybe she should go to dance class. She really should show some self-restraint. She was really jumping into this gaining thing quicker than she'd planned.
11121.title: Growing Quickly

113.content:
It was a cool winter day in November. A bus was going through a city, heading for the mall. Harper was sitting on the bus wearing a white north face jacket, a pair of pink gloves, and a white puff ball hat with tassles hanging with puff balls. Harper is a short fifteen year old girl with blonde hair, a white smile, and normal toned skin. Hidden behind Harper's north face was a belly bunched up since she was sitting down. Harper wasn't fat or overweight. Since she was a dancer, she had always been short and instead of growing up, she was slowly growing out. People labled her as a skinny girl, but deep down, she wanted to be a little bit bigger.

The bus stopped in front of the mall. Harper slowly rose up out of her seat and walked off the bus and into the mall. She was amazed at how big this mall was. She had been there many times before, but each time, the mall felt different since stores moved in and out of it and the mall was constantly remodeled. Harper started walking through the mall and even stopped at a couple of clothes stores, but didn't find anything she really liked. She stopped by Auntie Anne's Pretzel place and grabbed a cinnamon pretzel and even had some chinese food at the food court for lunch. After exploring the mall, Harper was growing tired and was about to head out of the mall when....
113.title: Harper Gets A Job Involving Food

choices: Harper Decides To Think About It
1131.content:
Harper then spotted a new ice cream place. She looked at the sign for the place, noticing it saying "Lisa's Ice Cream Parlor." Intrigued at the new place, Harper decided to go inside of the place. As she got in there, she noticed that the whole place was empty. The parlor looked nice as there was a red colored bar with red bar stools, white shining tiles, and pictures of ice cream hanging around. Harper then noticed the freezer of ice cream in front of her, which was directly next to the bar. Harper licked her lips as she noticed delicious flavors of ice cream that she had never had before. As Harper sat down at a bar stool, a lady walked in from the back of the place. The lady was young with black hair and a skinny body.

"Well hello there! Welcome to my ice cream parlor. I'm Lisa. What can I get you?" Lisa asked Harper.

"Could I get a large cup of your brownie lovers ice cream?" Harper asked politely in her innocent voice.

Within minutes, the ice cream was placed in front of Harper as she dug in with ease. Lisa watched the girl eat as she became intrigued with how quick Harper was eating her ice cream. Lisa came up with an idea that could benefit her.

"So what's your name?" Lisa asked Harper.

"My name is Harper. I'm assuming you're Lisa?" Harper asked.

"You are right. How old are you?" Lisa asked.

"I am currently fifteen," Harper said with a smile.

"Really? You are adorable for a fifteen year old," Lisa said with a laugh as Harper kept on grinning.

"Well thank you. I try," Harper said as she pulled her hat down, trying to look innocent.

"I tell you what. You seem like a lot of fun and you seem like you love to eat. Would you like to have a job here?" Lisa asked quickly.

"That sounds nice, but what kinds of things would I be doing?" Harper asked.

"Well if anything, you would serve customers. I mean, if we are not busy, you would taste test my ice cream, which will probably be a lot. On top of that, you could advertise outside the mall for me. I mean, you are dressed properly for that. And don't worry. Your hours would be flexible and I would pay you well. So what do you say? You could start now if you want by taste testing my other ice creams," Lisa said with a smile.

Harper felt that Lisa was right. She really couldn't turn down an offer like that.
1131.title: Harper Stops To Look At A New Ice Cream Parlor

choices: Harper Has To Go To Dance Rehearsal
Harper Wants To Shop For Some Clothes
11311.content:
"Okay, I'll take the job," said Harper with a smile as she finished her ice cream.

"Great! Just follow me to the back room!" Lisa said with a grin to Harper as she pointed to the back room.

Once in the back room of the shop, Lisa stood in front of Harper and explained to her what to do.

"So each day, there will be at least ten new ice cream flavors for you to try. You must eat and finish three scoops of each. If you would like, feel free to eat more than that. After trying each kind, fill out an evaluation sheet and tell me your thoughts about the ice cream. You will start off at $10.00 an hour with raises later on. Any questions?" Lisa asked.

"Yes. Do I need a uniform?" Harper asked.

"Well yes, but not right now. Just wear what you have on for now and you should be good. I'll get it for you later. Dig in!" Lisa said to Harper as she left her.

"Okay, I'll take these ones here," said Harper to herself, who was a little worried about the amount of ice cream she would be eating.

Harper finished her first five ice creams quickly and efficiently. She leaned back in her chair and burped lightly before rubbing her belly in relief. Even though she was at least half way through, she was feeling very full. Even though she felt full, Harper continued on through her four other ice creams until she reached the double chocolate fudge ice cream with white fudge pieces. She ate it very slowly while rubbing her belly with the other hand. By the time she was finished, she had eaten thirty scoops. She felt like she could eat no more.

"I'm so bloated right now. I need to just fill out the evaluation and go home," groaned Harper.

Quickly, Harper began to fill out her sheet. After doing so, she gave the forms to Lisa and left the ice cream parlor. Even though she felt full, Harper didn't care about what to do next. It was at that point that Harper put a hand on her belly, noticing it felt hard. With that, she went into the girl's bathroom with no one around and began to look at herself. Harper could tell that she had put on a few pounds from her dairy binge as she grabbed her belly. In some way, she felt she looked like she was at the start of a pregnancy, but she knew that only she would really notice this weight gain for now.

After getting out of the bathroom, Harper wonders what she needs to do next.
11311.title: Harper Accepts The Job

114.content:
It was another day in Harper's life. Harper opened up her eyes as she stretched her arms from the covers. She was just waking up on a saturday morning. She rubbed her eyes and smiled, thinking that today would be a great day. She moved her legs to the side of her bed and pulled herself up out of bed. Her room was very colorful as she was someone with a very colorful personality. She walked into her bathroom that was attached to her room, stopped and looked in the mirror. She was smiling at herself in the mirror and just staring at her body. She was wearing a white t-shirt with a pair of short shorts that were bright pink. She moved her eyes down her body until she hit a speed bump. Literally. Her whole body was slim until she reached her belly. You see, Harper was short for her age and because of dance, she was not that tall and would be short for a little while. Because she wasn't growing, much stuff went to her belly. Her belly stuck out a few inches, giving her a pregnant look to her belly. Her belly was still in her shirt, which meant that she wasn't super fat. In fact, she really didn't mind her belly, especially since people still labled her small and skinny. Part of her wanted to get fatter, but she knew that it would be pretty hard. She was tired of being labled as the short, small person.

"Maybe I should try gaining weight," Harper said to herself, trying to picture the idea in her head. Harper was trying to imagine being fatter, with love handles that were thick and chunky, multiple chins, and even be a few inches taller.

"Mmmmmmm.... the idea seems good. I'll try it!" Harper said to herself, rubbing her small belly and smiling at herself in the mirror.

After observing herself, Harper moved out of the bathroom and ran downstairs, trying to think of what to do next. She goes in the kitchen and finds....
114.title: Harper Wants To Be Bigger

1142.content:
Her fat younger sister, Gracie. Part of Harper is always jealous of her sister since she is fat and fine with it.

"Morning Harper! How are you?" She asked happily.

"Oh fine. Thanks for asking," She mumbled.

She got a bowl and took the box of cereal and noticed it was empty. She looked angirly at her sister.

"Did you eat all the cereal? You didn't leave any for me! I hate it that you always eat all the food without thinking about your older sister! What do you have to say for yourself?"

"I'm... I'm sorry. I was just hungry," Her sister said sadly.

"I wish we were lions sometimes. The older kids get to eat first before the young cubs," She said softly with an angry look at her sister.

Her sister took her bowl of cereal and waddled out of the kitchen while her belly jiggled as she walked. She had heard enough from her older sister and decided to eat the rest of the cereal while watching T.V. She knew she ate a lot of food, but she didn't want to be mean to her sister. She just had a big appetite. And true, she did't really think that others also wanted food. She belched loud.

Harper was sitting at the kitchen table thinking of what to do. Her sister ate all the cereal, which left her wondering what did she needed to eat now.

"Wait a sec. What am I doing? I wanted to gain weight. I just need to eat something fattening. Cereal is gone. So I need to eat something else!"

She opened the refrigerator and soon her eye saw something. Two sticks of butter. Why not? If she wanted to gain weight, butter was very fattening.
Fastly, she unwrapped the butter and started to stuff it in her mouth.

"Hey! That does taste pretty good! Why did I never eat this before?" She mumbled with her full mouth.

Soon the two sticks of butter found their way to her belly. Harper got up and looked in the cupboards, finding a box of cookies. She looked, smiling at how much fat the cookies contained and ripped the box open. Harper then started to stuff her face with cookies. After the cookies were gone, she ate a entire bag of pretzels.
Harper laid back and belched. She felt kind of stuffed in a good way. She rubbed her belly and smiled.

"All right girl," She said to her belly. "You're gonna be big, round and fat from this day on! Understand?"

She slowly rubbed her stuffed belly. Harper started thinking if there were other ways to get fat fast.

12.title: Olivia

choices: On The Way To Max's House (Dream Continued)
122.content:
It was a late winter night. Max was enjoying a walk with his girlfriend, Olivia. They were both freshman in high school and for a long time were friends but now they were going out, and they really liked eachother. Max had his arm around Olivia as they walked, Olivia being bundled up in a grey puff ball hat and a pink sweatshirt, and Max wearing only a light jacket. For some reason, Olivia looked bigger than usual, but she was wearing a sweatshirt, which may have been the reason.
"Thanks for tonight," Olivia said to Max, smiling.
"Anytime. You know you mean the world to me," Said Max. At that moment, they looked at eachother and started to ease into a kiss. And as they kissed, Max felt something hard rub up against his stomach. He looked down to see it was Olivia. She then unzipped her sweatshirt and Max saw it. It was her belly! She was once skinny but all of that was lost in her fat. Max backed away slightly to take it in his girlfriend now medium sized potbelly.

"What is it?" She asked.

"Nothing," said Max.

"Let's go back to my place," he said.
122.title: She Has A Dream And Wants To Get Fatter From It

He noticed her newly formed double chin and puffier cheeks, which made her look cuter. She noticed Max staring around at her body.

"Go ahead," se said, realizing what he was looking at.

"W..w..what?" He stammered.

"My belly" she said kind of seductively. "You have been wanting to rub my belly ever since we got home. Go ahead," she said, making them both smile.

"Yes, I want to touch your belly!" said Max.

"Well, I'll let you touch it. Go ahead," Olivia said, smiling.

He then proceeded to unbutton her shirt, which revealed a fleshy stomach and her boobs that were tight up against her bra. Her belly was sticking far out in front of her, lying on her body. He started to massage her belly. He noticed how her belly was warm and soft, loving the new feeling of her belly while Olivia loved the feeling of someone rubbing it.

1253.title: Other

12532.content:
“I heard…” Tiffany said leaning in closer and looking around to see if anyone was ease dropping, before continuing. “That the dreamy Max has a thing for pregnant bellies.” The girls she was talking to gasped together. “Oh my gosh, that’s so weird.” Laura quietly shouted, Olivia though thought about it, and asked Tiffany. “So, he thinks pregnant girls are hot?” She said suspiciously, Tiffany clarified. “Well, I think, I heard he just likes girls with big round bellies.” She said with a knowing smile. “He thinks they’re sexy.” Laura spoke up. “Well, that’s better, no way I’d get knocked up for a boy, but I might gain weight for him.” Laura looked longingly to a corner of the cafeteria where Max was eating with his curly light brown hair. “Well unless you can grow yourself a huge pot belly, he won’t be interested, he like big pregnant looking bellies, and that is not a look you get just from eating.” Tiffany said teasingly to Laura, meanwhile Olivia was focused intently on Max, she wanted him to like her, the moment she saw him last year she yearned to be noticed by him. If he wants a big belly, she would try to get one for him she thought, as she rubbed her stomach.

Later that night Olivia was in her room getting ready for bed, when she took out a balloon which she had bought earlier that day after find out about Max’s little kink. She blew into it and inflated it slightly, slipping it under her shirt giving her a cute little bulge looking like she was four months pregnant. She looked into the mirror, and posed seductively cradling her faux tummy, getting a little thrill. “Do you like it Max, I got it just for you.” She said seductively, as she imagined his reaction. Her smile faded as she realized how embarrassing this was, playing with balloons. “If I want to get Max’s attention, I’d need more than a balloon.” She said stroking her balloon belly, she pulled the balloon out from her clothes and placed it on her dresser.
12532.title: How about a combination of several choices.

125321.content:
Just then Olivia noticed a beautiful shooting star streak across the sky, taking the chance she closed her eyes and made a wish. I wish I had a big round pregnant looking belly for Max, she thought. She realized how silly this all was, but she quickly dismissed these doubts, because it’s not like it really mattered. She slipped under her covers and drifted off to sleep.

She dreamed she was in class, and Max was sitting near. Her heart started to beat in her, and her stomach started to do summersaults. When the bell rung, everyone started to leave class, Olivia swiftly tried to catch up to Max stumbling out of her seat. “Max, wait!” She hollered, prompting him to turn around and face her. She was panting and stammering, flustered by his presence. “Hey, Max I was wondering if you would like to go out some time.” The Max of her dreams, looked her over face unimpressed. “Sorry babe, you’re a little too skinny for my tastes.” Olivia’s heart sank, as she was shot down. She looked down, tears filling her eyes, when she noticed something in the school window. The same beautiful shooting star streaked by, making her feel reassured. She felt like something good was about to happen.
125321.title: Something happens while she dreams.

1253211.content:
The shooting star suddenly veered off course landing right between them, appearing as a little golf ball sized glowing orb. “Well what is this?” Max said picking it up. “This is so beautiful, but the poor thing is so tiny.” Olivia looked on in confusion, at Max’s strange reaction to the glowing orb. He prodded it gently with his finger, which made Olivia yelp. She felt it, when he prodded the orb, she felt his prod on her stomach, putting her hand stomach to feel. “All this little thing needs is some love.” Max said giving it a lite kiss, which made the orb suddenly puff up to the size of a baseball. She wore a light blue blouse over her short deep blue dress and a frilly skirt under that. “Olivia is that you?” Laura said noticing her classmate. “Where are we?” She asked nervously, confused by this whole event. “It’s a dream Laura, I fell asleep listening to Mr. Reynolds.” Laura shared a knowing glance with her. “Oh yeah, same, that guy is more boring than watching paint dry.” Olivia nodded in agreement and further said. “I’m more surprised to see you here, I didn’t expect you to invader my dreams.” Laura sneered at her in annoyance. “Hey, I didn’t invade your dreams alright, your dream abducted me, got that and hey what happened to your belly.” Laura exclaimed noticing the gravid bulge missing from Olivia’s middle.

“Oh that, it’s here!” Olivia said pointing out the orb she held. “What are you talking about.” Laura said, confused with the concept. “This is my belly, or at least I can feel everything as if it were.” Olivia said showing the large orb to her classmate. Laura poked it experimentally eliciting a giggle from Olivia. “Does this have something to do with those dreams you talked about.” Laura asked giving Olivia an intimidating look. “Well… actually yeah, in my dreams the orb would grow when Max played with it and then I’d be bigger in real life.” Olivia explained nervously. “What Max has been here.” Laura replied utterly surprised at that information. “Well a dream version of Max.” interjected but was interrupted as Laura snatched the orb from her grasp and walked away with it. “Hey what are you doing that’s mine!” Olivia shouted futilely at her classmate, who turned to confront her. “I get it now, you tricked him, you abducted poor Max from his dreams and used this orb to make him your boyfriend.”
Laura anger frightened Olivia who chased after her, but Laura’s sudden slap to the orb stopped her in her tracks. “Ow, you bitch.” Olivia whined as she rubbed her stomach. “This should be mine and Max should be mine!” Laura cried obviously going hysterical with envy. Laura stared intently at the orb, she noted how soft and pliable it felt. A crazy idea came to her mind, one spurned by an obsession for Max’s love and the jealousy she felt toward Olivia.

Taking a chance Laura unexpectedly started trying to stuff the orb in her mouth. Olivia was rendered frozen in place as she both felt and saw the bizarre action of her classmate. Olivia cried out to Laura too overwhelmed by the whole situation to move. “Stop that right now, what the hell are you trying to do eat me, you’ll choke!?” Surprisingly to both of them the orb seemed to easily slide into her mouth, which then resulted in an intense squeezing sensation for Olivia. “No please… don’t, you don’t know what will happen.” Laura just looked at her with a sinister smile, as if saying I don’t care and continued to slide the orb deeper down her gullet. Olivia was overwhelmed by the constricting feeling, but then the feeling started to change, it became more like a painful emptiness. As the orb disappeared down Laura’s mouth, she took a big gulp and they both awoke to find.
1253211111112111112.title: It was her classmate Laura!

choices: Olivia waits until after school to confront Laura.
12532111111121111121.content:
She looked down and noticed to her shock that her stomach was back to its old flat self. Confused and distraught she looked around the classroom for answers and noticed Laura looked uncomfortable. When she looked her over to see the source of her discomfort the reason was obvious. Laura strangely looked a lot fatter than she did before and her clothes were ridiculously tight. The blouse she wore over her dress was stretched taut, huge gaps formed between the buttons where her dress could be seen underneath. They lasted for just a moment before the buttons quietly popped off falling to the floor. Jutting out through her blouse was a huge gravid bulge which looked disturbingly familiar to Olivia. “There’s no way… she couldn’t have.” Olivia whispered quietly to herself, the obvious truth displayed in front of her.

Laura chuckled deviously as she looked down at herself and caressed her big beautiful pregnant looking belly, the one she had just stolen from Olivia.

1321.content:
"Good night Mom! Good night Dad!" Marie shouted to her parents as she ran upstairs to go to bed. It was eleven at night and a friday night. Marie had no plans and was exhausted from the school week. Marie went into her room and took off her clothes. She looked at herself in the mirror and noticed that she looked in great shape from top to bottom. After observing herself, Marie opened up her drawer and took out a pink shirt with a pair of sweat pants. Marie was getting herself ready for bed like usual.

After slipping on the clothes, Marie noticed that her clothes fit well, not being too big or too small. Marie began to shut off her electronics when she noticed on her lap top, she forgot to close out of her essay that was dur in a week. Marie started to read the title of the essay: "If Gretel Was In Hansel's Position." Marie's language arts class were reading fairy tales lately. Their current assignment was to write about a fairy tale in a different way. Marie chose to write about Hansel and Gretel, but if Gretel were fattene up. After reading the title, Marie saved the document and shut down her computer. But even after that, Marie kept on thinking about the assignment as she began to question herself.

"What if Gretel was fattened? Would she want it? Would she live? Would she be bigger than Hansel was fattened? What would happen?" Marie began to ask herself.

She shook it off for a moment, slipped under her covers and began to close her eyes to go to sleep. Before finally falling into her slumber, Marie asked herself a question that could stay in her mind for a while:

"If I was Gretel, what would I do?"


After that, Marie fell asleep, leading her to the beginning of her Hansel and Gretel dream....
1321.title: Sweet Dreams, Marie

choices: Marie wakes up, but something's happened to her body
The dream continues, and the witch fattens her up more, like it or not
13211.content:
Marie's eyes cracked open, as if she just woke up. Cold bars were the first thing she saw, until she fully opened her eyes to an entire cage. Sweet smells constantly hit her nose as she examined the area outside of the bird cage.

"Am I...", she thought in her head, seeing what appeared to be a house interior completely made of sweets,"... Am I Gretel?"

An oddly beautful lady in a witch's outfit appeared. "Hello, lovely. I'm so glad to see that you're awake! Do you want something to eat?"

The witch was unlike the ones you'd here in tales, in multiple ways. Instead of the known ugly green face, she looked very human, besides her oddly red eyes. She was also quite curvy, and her fabric intended to show that off, and to top it all off, her voice sweet, almost hypnotizing.

Marie weakly responded, "I guess I am a little hungry", leaving the witch very excited. "Alright!", said the witch, "Hansel, your sister would like a nice (fattening) meal." Soon, Hansel walked into the room with a plate of chocolate on his hand. "Alright, here you go", he said, and with that, he was off. No hi, no anything, just a disappointed look on his face when he left. "Wonder why he looked so grim...", she thought to herself.

She sat down and layed the plate on her lap, hesitantly picking up the first piece, and then quickly shoved it in her mouth.Almost instantly amazing flavors flooded her taste buds,and she finally realized how hungry she was, and with that, she scarfed down the rest of the chocolates.

Everything was good until suddenly she began feeling strange. She looked around, examining her body, hoping she could find what was responsible, but she found much worse. Her belly began to slowly push outwards, tightening the fabric on her dress, followed by her rear, which splayed a few more inches while she sat, pulling up her dress just enough to reveal her thickening thighs, making it harder to sit criss cross, her breasts outgrowing her original C. Even worse, her stomach rumbled even louder than before.

"Looks like someone's still hungry...", the witch smirked, and with just a snap, there was even more chocolate...
13211.title: Sweet Imprisonment

choices: Marie wakes up, skinny, for now.
Marie wakes up obese and immobile.
132112.content:
"N-No, I dont need anymore." says Marie, "Oooh sweetie, you thought you had a choice." says the witch. "W-What!"says Marie. Suddenly Marie feels a tingly feeling in her swollen belly. "Ah, what are you doing." asks Marie, "Well, isnt it obvious, im increasing your appetite to fatten you up." says the witch in a mischievous tone. "No, I dont want to be fat!" exclaims Marie, "Aww, thats sweet of you to think that im going to stop there, when im done with you this entite candy house will seem like a light snack." says the witch. As soon as the witch finishes Marie feels a wave of hunger wash over her, making her feel like she hasnt eaten in weeks with the belly the size of an over inflated yoga ball, tits twice the size of her head and an ass that could destroy most chairs.

"So... are you huunnngry, I bet you are, with all this delicious food lying around." says the witch playfully, while letting Marie out of the cage. "MORE!" yells Marie as she starts chowing down on anything in her sight, nothing escaping the black hole that is her mouth, first munching down on the witches candy house, starting with her gram cracker table and marshmellow chairs then moves on to the kitchen sink drinking the milk from the tap, balloning out in all directions. After drinking the milk, Marie starts eating the gummy couch and the peanut brittle coffee table after that every thing starts to blur and when Marie calms down from her eating frenzy and looks around sees that shes HUGE, a belly the size of a small car, tits the size of car tires and an ass that could take up an entire couch. Marie looks around and sees that shes eaten the witches entire house.

"My My, you sure have an appetite, dont worry about the house" says the witch. "Are you ready for round 2?" says the witch. "N-No please, im already big enough, I must weigh at least a ton." says Marie, "I know, we have a long way to go, I know, hang on a second." says the witch. Marie cant see what the witch is doing but the witch sticks a hose in Maries mouth. "This will fatten you up fast, have fun." says the witch. She can feel the liquid traveling down her throat, the taste of chocolate overwelming, inflating her body, covering her mouth then eyes, the last thing Marie hears before passing out is the witch saying "Not enough." then...
132112.title: The dream continues, and the witch fattens her ...

The Witch Comes Out (The Dream Continues)
13212.content:
As Marie started to close her eyes, she felt her eyes open up, finding herself staring up, looking at some clouds moving by. Marie looked at herself. She was wearing a white button up dress shirt with a black skirt. Although she usually wouldn't wear this, she thought it looked cute on her.

"Wake up, Gretel!" Marie heard as she continued to wake up. She lifted her head off of the ground to see who was calling that name. As she turned around, she saw someone standing up by her head looking down at her. It was a boy with blonde hair that covered his eyes a little, fair colored skin, and a skinny body. The boy looked like Cody Martin from "The Suite Life Of Zack And Cody" to Marie, but she ignored this and pointed to herself.

"Me?" She asked.

"Yes you, Gretel. We need to walk on!" The boy said. Marie got up as the boy started pulling her on. Marie started to think about what was happening. "This has to be a dream! Maybe this is Hansel" Marie said inside of her head.

"Hansel, where are we going?" Marie asked, hoping that that was the boy's name.

"Anywhere that will take us. Hopefully we can find a house," Hansel said to Marie. Marie was happy that she got his name right. They both kept on walking and talking to each other until finally, they saw a structure in the distance. It looked like a brown house decorated with colorful accents. The two of them continued to walk closer to see what kind of house the place was. It was then they came close enough to realize that it was a gingerbread house. As they looked at the house, Marie started to feel hunger in her belly. She wanted to eat some of the house.

"Let's eat!" Hansel said, pulling Marie towards the house. But before Marie could start biting into the house....
13212.title: Marie Finds The Gingerbread House With Hansel

choices: As The Week Went On, Marie Continues Binging...
132121.content:
Before they bit into the house, Marie blinked her eyes. As she opened her eyes, she noticed that she was looking up at her ceiling. She wasn't dreaming anymore. She looked at her clock and noticed that it was only 1 A.M in the morning. Although it was late, Marie felt really hungry for some reason. She felt like she had never eaten before. Marie moved her legs out of the covers to the side of her bed as she began to walk out of her room, down the stairs, and into the kitchen. She opened up her refridgerator to see what was in there.

"Hmmmm.... german chocolate cake? Twinkies? Left over steak? Hm... maybe I should just take all of these things upstairs," She said to herself as she grabbed all of these along with a bucket of ice cream, a spoon, fork, and knife. She quietly strolled upstairs into her room and sat on her bed. She started to eat the food at a tremendous rate. She first grabbed the ice cream to make sure it wouldn't melt. She shoved spoonful after spoonful into her gullet, indulging into this food like never before. She loved the feeling of eating in the middle of the night. She kept on eating the food, moving onto the steak. Although this food was tasting delicious, she wasn't thinking about the side effects it would have on her.....
132121.title: Marie Wakes Up In The Middle Of The Night

choices: That Night, Marie Heads To Bed
1321211.content:
A week had went by since Marie had last had her Hansel and Gretel-themed dream. Although it was weird, it was a dream that Marie had remembered very well. In all honestly, it was showing for Marie. Within the last week, Marie had been eating more food due to a small increase in her hunger. At breakfast, Marie would eat at least three or four pancakes drenched in syrup. Usually for lunch at school, Marie would grab about four slices of pizza usually with chips and coke. Dinner was a whole different story as Marie began to come back for second and sometimes thirds. None of this included the additional snacking or desserts after dinner. Marie did not really notice that her clothes were getting a bit snug on her. If anything, Marie had gained a noticeable ten pounds, which was not too big yet.

Marie had been stressed from school, family, and many other occurances in her life. She felt like the food was a comfort to her with no side effects. She was pretty wrong about the side effects, though. She still had not noticed. If anything, she kept on thinking her clothes must have shrunk or that she was going through a growth spurt or a period. But what Marie didn't really know is that the Hansel and Gretel-themed dreams were affecting her. And soon, it would affect her again. Marie got home from school, had her traditional snack and began to do her homework. She also grabbed some more food after homework before her dinner, grabbing the sweetest things she could find. She wasn't noticing what any of this food was doing to her.
1321211.title: A Week And Marie Continues Binging

choices: she was awake and a bit chubbier.
she was awake and stuffed silly.
132122.content:
The two teens were startled to see that the door opened, revealing a sight that neither expected, though for Marie it was for a completely different reason. She had been expecting a portly old woman as the witch, however, what she saw instead was a beautiful girl, who looked only a few years older than her, maybe in her early adulthood, wearing a black dress decorated by the face of an owl on its chest, on her head was a classic witches hat, with a crooked top, which slightly hid her young, beautiful face.

"Oh my, visitors." she said, looking to the two teens in her front garden, who both stared at her with guilty looks.

"S-Sorry ma'am...we were looking around for somewhere to stay and we saw your house...i-is it all made of candy?" Marie asked, looking at the structure longingly, the young witch smiling a bit and nodding proudly. "Yes, yes it is!" she said, standing proud, hands on her hips as she smiled, before looking to the two. "So I take it you're both hungry?" she asked them with a smile, Marie and Hansel slowly nodding as the witch smiled, pulling them into a hug. "Great, I've been wanting to try cooking for others for a while" she said, smiling as she brought the two skinny youths into her home, closing the door and seating them at the table, which was made of chocolate and candycanes.

Marie swallowed hard, knowing how the story went, she sat down, not wanting to make the obvious witch angry by refusing as she quickly got to work cooking. "So um...whats your name miss?" Marie asked, looking to their host, who smiled back at her while stirring a pot. "Anastacia." she said, smiling and clicking her fingers, the mixture in the pot rising up into a pair of fabulous chocolate cakes, which she set on plates and brought over to the two famished teens, winking. "But you can call me Annie sweetie~" she said, an odd tone to her voice that made Marie blush as she looked to the cake in front of her, Hansel doing the same.

"Well? what's wrong guys? eat your fill" she said, smiling at them, Marie slowly working up the courage to pick up a slice and start eating. The moment the cake touched her tongue, she felt like she'd made a good choice, actually moaning some as she chewed the delectable delicacy.

Annie smiled as she watched the two eat their cakes, glad they were enjoying their meal as she set about preparing more treats for them, everything from fruitcake to tarts, to candycanes, to sweet rolls, all of which the two children devoured voraciously, their appetites belying their bodies protests as they ate and ate, bellies bulging in their formerly loose clothing.

As Marie sat back, finished with her meal, she let out a long burp, sighing happily as she rubbed her gut. This might only have been a dream, but it sure was a fun one, she thought as she licked her fingers clean, savouring the last bits of frosting on them as she looked over to Hansel, but then arched a brow as she looked at him up and down, something seeming off as the boy's hair seemed longer than before, and unless she was hallucinating, he also seemed a bit more...feminine.

"Well, you two look like you enjoyed your meals~" Annie said, standing at the end of the table, hands on her hips as she smiled that kind smile at them, before she went over and offered Marie a hand, which the girl gladly took, standing up slowly, before Annie went around to Hansel, doing the same thing.

"Now, I'll bet you two are sleepy." she said, smiling as both teens yawned, leading them into a bedroom with two really big beds, laying them down to sleep.

Marie smiled, closing her eyes in the dream, and when she opened them again...
132122.title: The Witch Comes Out (The Dream Continues)

choices: The two go shopping, Marie feeling hungrier all the while
Abbie convinces Marie to try working out with her
1321222.content:
Marie awoke with a soft smile on her lips. The dream was fading from her mind, but the memory of being pleasantly full stayed with her. She moaned soft and moved her hands to her flat tummy. She opened her eyes with a start and tossed her sheets off. The clingy pink t-shirt she had gone to bed in was pushed up a few inches by something that was definitely not the trim middle she knew and loved. Her stomach, like in her dream, was stuffed, maybe even more so. She rubbed it and moaned, confused. She got out of bed, finding it a little hard to bend in the middle.

Having just admired her figure the night before it was easy for her to see the difference. Her belly popped out gently, round and very firm. She was able to pull her shirt down over it, although she thought it actually made her look pregnant.

"Uhg," she said to herself as she cupped her poor tummy in her hands. This was not the peaceful, content feeling from her dream. She felt bloated, full, and embarrassed to even see herself. Like anyone she had experienced bloating before, but it never felt like this. She really felt like she had eaten a feast that was too much for her stomach to keep up.

She was glad it was Saturday. The swelling, whatever it was, ought to go down by Monday. She had plans to go shopping with Abbie, one of her best friends and former teammate on the school track team, but otherwise planned to take it easy. If Marie had one flaw it was her laziness. It was why she quit track in the first place. Granted, she was one of the lesser members on the team, while Abbie was actually the star runner in the school. Abbie, who like Marie spoke with a bluntness that others found disconcerting, warned Marie that even if she quit track they should still work out together.

"You love your junk food and if you don't stay on top of it you'll blow up," Abbie had said, with her usual frankness.

"Shoot me if that happens," Marie had said. She might not have the tone of her friend, but she was still thin with just the right amount of softness on her body. She didn't even want to entertain the prospect of gaining weight.

And now here she was, only a few weeks out of her athletic life and already sporting a sad, round gut. At least it wasn't fat, she thought rubbing her sour stomach. Abbie might have been right after all. Of course, that didn't explain why she woke up feeling stuffed to the gills despite not having gone to bed in such a state, but for the moment she was writing this off as really bad bloating. Bloating that felt uncomfortably heavy.

She texted Abbie that she was ready to meet up whenever she was, then showered, did her hair and make up, and donned a pair of jeans which pressed uncomfortably into her full tummy. Every t-shirt and tank top she owned seemed to ride up over her engorged belly when she moved, and whenever she bent over she had the unpleasant sensation of thinking her jeans' button would pop open. The worse part, aside from the discomfort and creeping thoughts of a full stomach turning into a fat stomach, would be that she knew Abbie would notice and say something.

She might even try to get her to work out. Marie shuddered. It would be the right thing to do. One didn't just let a fine figure as hers go without a fight. But she was dead set on taking it easy that such effort on a weekend was almost as distasteful to her as the bump now protruding from her previously perfect profile.
1321222.title: A filling dream

choices: Marie is too full to eat, but Abbie digs in uncharacteristically
Marie stuffs herself with abandon and instant regret
13212221.content:
Marie attempted to suck in her stomach when she heard Abbie pulling up, and found that the hard lump of her stomach simply wouldn't budge. The effort did nothing but dislodge a few burps which she was happy to get rid of before Abbie arrived. She grabbed her purse and went to meet her friend. She wasn't fast enough. Abbie was already entering through the front door as Marie walked down the stairs.

"Hey! Let's get moving. I saw some shoes last week I wanted to-"

Abbie interrupted her by raising her hands and staring, her eyes a little too wide to be anything but insulting, at Marie's tummy. Marie sighed as Abbie spoke.

"Shoes? I think maybe you'll need some new pants soon," Abbie said it in as gentle a way as she could, but like Marie, was too naturally blunt to ease into the topic. "What's this here?"

She poked Marie's stomach.

"It's hard as a rock," she said.

"It's just a little bloating," Marie said. Her relaxing afternoon with her best friend was off to a bad start. "Lay off, okay?"

"That's more than a little. You're starting to get a gut-"

"Don't say that," Marie snapped. Hearing the words from somebody else sent a shiver down her spine. "It's just bloating, okay? It'll go away by tomorrow or something."

As the two walked out to their car, Marie couldn't help but resent that Abbie was wearing a shirt that proudly showed off some of her toned stomach while Marie kept having to tug at her shirt to keep her bloated one hidden.

"Remember our promise? If either one of us starts showing any signs of gaining weight, we'd tell the other one. I'd want you to do the same for me."

Yeah, like that would ever happen, Marie thought. For the first time in her life she had some small inkling of jealousy for her friend's figure. She shook off the feeling. It was as absurd for her to be depressed over being a little bloated as it was for Abbie to make such a big deal about it.

"All right, let's work out later, fine?" Marie said. Abbie agreed, and dropped the subject. She reiterated that she wasn't trying to be mean, just that she wanted to stop her friend from letting herself go right from the start before any serious damage could be done. The net effect, by the time they got to the mall, was that Marie had to force herself to have a good time.

"These are the cutest jeans," Abbie said. Marie agreed. She did need some new ones . . .

She grabbed a pair she knew was her size to try on. She regretted it. They pressed into her poor stomach painfully. Standing up perfectly straight, her profile to the mirror, she experimentally pushed her stomach out just a little. The button obliging popped open with a depressingly little struggle. She didn't even ask Abbie how she looked in them.

"C'mon, to the shoes," Marie said. Her stomach, incredibly, suddenly growled loud enough to be heard of the din of the surrounding mall. She blushed, rubbing it gently.

Abbie laughed. "Yeah, I could go for some food, too." Then, in what Marie could only interpret as Abbie just teasing for the sake of making her earlier point stick, she patted Abbie's stomach and briskly led the way to the food court. Marie was stunned. She didn't know whether to let it go or to call Abbie on it. She just stood stock still for a moment, both her hands over her stomach.

"It's just a little bloating!" she said, deciding to not make an issue out of it, as she ran after her friend.
13212221.title: Too bloated for clothes shopping

choices: "Let's work out, it's what I have to do."
"I'm beat, want to go watch a movie or something?"
132122212.content:
The mall's food court had many small, cozey niches that Abbie and Marie, like many other teenagers, made much use of. They could sit there for hours and talk, and often did. Marie was looking for to one of her pleasant chats with Abbie less than usual, and it had something to do with her stomach growling loud enough to be heard by Abbie. For her part, Abbie did pretend to ignore it, and only brought it up again when Marie grunted in frustration and held her stomach tightly hoping it would stop it

"Oh my god, how can I be hungry? I already feel stuffed."

"And look stuffed," Abbie added.

"Thanks," Marie sneered. She wasn't entirely certain her friend was really trying to get her to shape up before she lost her shape, or if she secretly enjoyed seeing her frustrated and bloated.

"I'll have a vegie burger with light cheese. And a water," Abbie said. Marie approached next intending to order the same thing. That'll show her who has self control, she thought smugly as she looked up at the cashier.

"I'll have . . ." woooooooorgle "two double cheeseburgers and an extra large fries. Large soda, too."

She stepped to the side and gave her friend a smug look.

"Jesus, Marie," Abbie said with a slight smile, "No wonder you're bloated with all the grease you're eating."

"What are you-" Marie smacked her head and made a frustrated groan. She just now realized what she had ordered. "Shut up," she turned an accusing finger on her friend.

Once seated, Abbie spoke at length about her issues with Travis which Travis's sister was complicating by not minding her business and for some reason pretending to be into Travis annoying best friend Mark. The tail held many twists and turns, many of which Marie was familiar with, but she had little to add. She couldn't get a word out edgewise. From the moment she sat down it was like her body went on auto pilot. She munched on both burgers with a robotic efficiency, taking large gulps of her soda and breaking for a few fries every couple of bites. She nodded and "mmmm"ed to Abbie when required. As she approached the end of her second burger, Marie felt an unfamiliar feeling. It wasn't completely unpleasant, but was uncomfortable, and soon began verging on painful. She was sitting up straighter than usual now. Abbie's story faltered as she saw the look of pain on Marie's face.

"What's wrong?" Abbie asked slowly, with the irritating hint of a smile on the corner of her lips.

"I . . . I . . . " having stopped eating for the first time since they sat down Marie realized she was having trouble breathing, ". . . hurts!" was all she said. She eyed the last bite of her last burger, and automatically popped it in her mouth.

POP

As the pain of her jeans digging into her immediately vanished, Marie blushed bright red, her eyes darted to her stomach and back to Abbie. She had, incredibly, popped her jeans open. Her tummy, puffy since she woke up, now looked rounded. It was hard, heavy, and as Marie discovered as she pulled her shirt down over it, a little gassy. She belched before she thought of something to say. She could see the waves of reactions going over her friend's face. Since both Abbie and Marie were very athletic and took their figures and health seriously, either one of them pigging out like this, especially in public, would have been cause for concern for one and humiliation for the other. Abbie looked first worried, then disgusted, then she wore a strange mocking expression, then a concerned one again, and finally settled on a kind, condescending smile.

"Oh Marie," Abbie said as Marie hunched forward and hugged her arms across her stuffed middle.

"Shut up, Abbie!" Marie said, then softened her tone. She wasn't sure if Abbie was not-so-secretly enjoying this or not, but she definitely wanted to lash out at somebody other than herself for her bizarre lack of control today. "I'm sorry, I . . . I didn't mean that."

"It's okay," Abbie said, "It's no big deal, okay? We all go overboard sometimes. And you have me to make sure it doesn't become a regular thing, right?"

Marie found that reassuring. Not that she was concerned for her figure. Despite waking up bloated, and now stuffing her face with more calories than she usually ate in a day in a matter of minutes, she was sure this was just a temporary lapse in her normal, athletic diet.

Right? But, still, there was something unnerving in the way Abbie had looked at her just then.

"Where to next?" Abbie asked with a yawn and a muffled burp.
132122212.title: Mall stuffing

choices: Her belly was even more stuffed than before and bigger than ever
The food had started to turn to fat, starting with her middle
1321222122.content:
"I'm beat. Want to go back to your place and watch a movie or something?" Marie asked.

"Mmm," Abbie looked her friend over, "Sounds nice, but weren't we going to work out?"

"Come on, Abbie, I'm exhausted and I feel awful. I'm not up for working out," Marie rubbed her belly gently. It moaned and gurgled under her hands.

"That's when you need to work out the most. But okay, fine, but promise me we'll go work out tomorrow, okay?"

"Sure, I promise," Marie said.

"You don't want all that food to stick, you know," Abbie said, but the hint of mockery in her voice caused Marie to blush.

"It won't," she said, standing up. Her shirt rode back up over her bloated middle. She pulled it down with a huff, but didn't try to button her jeans again. The short, slim, bloated brunette walked awkwardly out of the mall next to her elegant friend. Elegant, at least, compared to the tired looking and gassy Marie.

Neither could decide on a movie once back at Abbie's, so they would up just relaxing in front of the TV. Within minutes of the two sitting down Marie found herself drifting off to sleep. Abbie either didn't notice or didn't care. She was busy looking at things on her phone, responding to other friends. With a few quiet burps Marie dozed off next to her friend . . .

"My, you certainly can eat!" the lovely young witch sat across from Marie and her friend/brother, who was now very obviously a slim blonde girl who reminded Marie of Abbie.

"I-urp-guess so, but I didn't eat that much, did I?" Marie recalled vividly how she had just made a feast out of much of the witch's candy house. She looked over to her sister, "Besides, Hannah (which is what Marie decided her name must be) ate way more. Look how bloated she is."

Hannah's sleepy face turned toward her. Her belly looked quiet massive. "Then eat more," she said sleepily, "so you can catch up."

"Ha! No way," Marie said, thinking she was starting to see where this witch was coming from, "You can fatten her but not me. I see your game and it won't work. This is as big as I'm ever going to get," Marie patted her full, and slightly bloated, tummy proudly.

The witch didn't look annoyed. More bemused, really. She smiled sweetly at Marie.

"But you came her to eat my house, didn't you?"

"Kind of, I think?"

"And everything here are delicious sweets just for sweet girls like you," the witch smiled, "Why, the table you were just eating off of is nothing more than a giant s'more."

This was true. Marie licked her lips when she noticed this. Her taut tummy rumbled.

"Quiet you," she said, patting it.

"And I'm sure you have enough room left for one measly little table, mmm?"

Marie shook her head. This was becoming very familiar. The witch snapped her fingers and laughed pleasantly.

"Eat up, Marie! You don't want to insult our host!" Hannah said.

Marie dug in before she knew what she was doing. She squealed in protest but it was through a mouth full of graham cracker and thick, warm marshmallow. She simply leaned forward and dug in, shoveling handful after handful of the table itself into her mouth and swallowing with hardly any chewing. She felt her tummy groan under the pressure, the fairy tale German-style dress she was in creaked around the middle as the seams struggled to contain her growing stomach. It hurt, and though she could barely even taste the rich treat she was stuffing her face with, something about it felt too good to stop.

After what seemed like hours of this she was forced back upward and could no longer lean forward. She tried, but something blocked her. Something hard, round, and painfully full stood in the way. She leaned back and gripped her belly tight with a loud belch.

"Ooooh, god. -urrrrrp!- Please, can I stop now?" she said after catching her breath. Marie looked down at her belly, pregnant with food, and over at the delighted face of the sleepy Hannah.

"Perhaps for now," the witch said as she made her way around the remains of the s'more table and laid her hands on Marie's bare, tight belly, "But this isn't over."

Marie awoke slowly as the dream faded from her memory. She heard Abbie telling her wake up first, and then as the details of the dream vanished the only memory left was the feeling of being massively, painfully stuffed. She felt a hand on her stomach and threw her eyes open, angrily slapping Abbie's obtrusively hand away. Then, she saw what Abbie did, felt what had changed, and made a sound best described as a yelp combined with a belch as her mind reeled at the sight.
1321222122.title: Yet another dream

13212221221.content:
Marie had gone to sleep, slouched on the couch and bloated, her jeans unbuttoned and her shirt riding up just a little now. Now, her stomach was flat our round, and her zipper was staring to be forced downward as her belly button crept into view. She stared wide-eyed at her full stomach, which now stuck out as far as her breasts. She pressed it with her hands. It was as hard as it felt. She belched as she tried to speak. She tried again.

"Bwaaaarp!" was all that came out. She blushed bright red both from the embarrassment and the strain she felt. It seemed to her that a solid rock had been jammed into her stomach.

"I-I don't know what happened," Abbie said, unable to take her eyes from her. "One minute, I was on my phone, then you started moaning in your sleep and your stomach was, um, bigger. How does it feel?" Abbie poked it.

"Bwuuuuuraaap!" Marie's mouth opened wide. She slapped Abbie away again. "So . . . so full . . ." she wheezed. She tried to stand but the movement made her nauseous. "How? Urrrrp!"

"I don't know," Abbie said with a sympathetic look and a strange smile. Marie saw her hand reaching for her middle again. She would have been angrier if she wasn't so worried. Abbie seemed to be enjoying her pain and humiliation.

"I should get up," Marie said softly. Slowly, she stood up, holding her stomach tightly. It felt worse as she tried to stand up straight.

"Do you need anything?" Abbie asked, standing up with her. She put a helpful arm around her friend's shoulder while her other remained posed, ready to reach out for Marie's horribly bloated stomach.

Marie's head spun. She was exhausted as though she had just eaten a Thanksgiving feast, which is probably what happened. But she hadn't eaten anything in hours, and how could you get fuller just by dreaming about food? At least, she thought she dreamed about food.
13212221221.title: Bigger, bloated Marie

choices: With a whole lot of fatty, delicious foods
132122212212.content:
"I . . . I just need to lie down for a little, okay?" Marie said. Abbie stood up and let Marie stretch out on the couch. Her belly jutted up from its usual flat shape. She tugged her shirt down to mostly cover it, but didn't both buttoning her jeans. Abbie looked her over, shaking her head slightly.

"What?" Marie asked, resting her hands on her poor, sore, stomach. The skin felt stretched tightly around her middle.

"Nothing, you just look so, well, bloated," Abbie said, her voice only barely softening at the word.

"Lay off," Marie said, laying her head back. She closed her eyes, feeling sleep come over her . . .

"My my my, back for more, are you?" the witch said.

Marie looked across a table full of the food. The witch looked younger now, almost her age, and seemed very familiar. She reminded her of Abbie now. Hannah, the girl who she took to be Abbie before, sat stuffed, fattened, and comatose across the table.

"No more," Marie said. She waved her hands on front of her. "I'm too full. I don't want to get fat."

"It's too late for that," the witch said in a sing songy voice as Marie felt a powerful groan in her stomach. It inched outward, not just in front but oozing out along her sides as well. Her breasts began swelling in her bra. She panted, gasped, and finally screamed.

Marie awoke, probably minutes later, and could have sworn she saw her already stuffed stomach push upward under hands. She rubbed it, now wide awake. Did it feel softer? She looked at it, noticing that her usually shallow naval did look a little deeper. Her jeans dug into her sides now, softness appearing there for the first time.

"Abbie, something's wrong," she said, but didn't sit up. "Abbie? Don't let me fall asleep again, okay?" Marie's breathing slowed. It was just a dream, but still, this new feeling around her middle did not feel like bloating. It felt uncomfortably, frightfully, like fat.

Marie turned her head, and was about to sit up when Abbie entered the room . . .

14.title: Shea

choices: Shea Makes A Plan To Binge On Food That Night
Shea Decides She Wants To Hang Out With Nick The Next Day
142.content:
It was a winter night toward the end of November. There was about a foot of snow on the ground. In the woody neighborhood outside of the main town, there was a group of children playing outside in the snow. One girl was behind a snow bank throwing snow balls at her friends. The girl behind the snow bank is named Shea. Shea is an 11 year old girl with brown wavy hair and brown eyes. Her skin is white but is darker than average. She used to play sports, but she had quit a while ago, but she was still popular at her school. But since she quit sports, she had put on a little bit of weight. Nothing too big, but she hada noticeable pot belly. It was covered right now with a blue puffy jacket, blue gloves, blue snow pants, and a puff ball hat that had a pink puff ball, the top part of the hat was pink with brown patterns, and the other part of the half was blue. No one knew why, but Shea was always wearing this hat. Deep down, she had a thing for wearing winter hats and clothes. But no matter what, she didn't care what anyone thought. At the house, Shea was playing with a group of family friends that were over for a little while. Shea turned her head and immediately, she was hit in the head with a snow ball. She cleared the snow off of her face to see who threw it. She looked over to a nearby snow bank to see a boy with his head out from behind, smiling. This was Shea's crush. His name was Nick.

Nick was the second oldest kid in his family. He was like Shea in many ways, except for the hat part. He has hair that is longer and brown, he was popular in school, he currently wasn't playing any sports, and he had a little of a belly. He was wearing a brown puffy jacket with gloves, boots, snow pants and a brown hat with tassles. Shea smiled back at him, admiring his friendly gesture.

After a while of throwing snow balls, the kids stopped and Nick's other three siblings headed inside, while Shea and Nick followed behind them.

"Nice job today, Shea," Nick said.

"Thanks," Shea said to him with a smile.

"You're getting bigger. I like what I'm seeing. keep it up," Nick said to Shea, walking inside and leaving her with a smile.

Shea paused in her tracks and smiled. Nick wanted her fatter? What does she start to think about?
142.title: Shea's Crush

choices: Shea Continues To Eat More Food....

1421.content:
Shea couldn't believe that Nick wanted her fatter. The idea made her more excited than she thought she would be. She was trying to think of what she could do to make herself fatter quicker. As she was thinking about fattening up, her stomach let out a huge growl. Shea was getting hungry.

"That's it!" Shea said to herself. She thought of an idea to binge all night on sweet, junk food that would fill her up and bulge her out! After thinking about this, Shea opened her sliding glass door and went inside, noticing that Nick and his family was gone. She could hear her parents, but they were somewhere around the house. Shea didn't waste a moment. She took off her boots, leaving everything else on. She didn't care that her clothes were still on. All she cared about was eating and getting fatter.

She immediately ran into her kitchen and started to grab left over food from the get together. After grabbing the huge amount of food, Shea ran upstairs, into her room and locked her door. She looked at all of the food she had grabbed. She grabbed 20 left over chicken wings, eight twinkies, five slices of german chocolate cake, a galloon bin of vanila ice cream, and she grabbed three two liters of coke. Shea knew that all of this food would help increase her weight gain.

Shea sat herself on her bed and started digging into the wings. She kept on grabbing and biting into the wings, tearing the chicken wings apart. Although they tasted spicy, Shea kept on sucking the succulent meat off the bones and took a swig of coke here and there. The more she ate, the more she knew that she was pleasing Nick. After a while of eating and eating, Shea noticed that all that was left of her wings were bones. Shea had eaten all twenty wings within a half hour! Although she felt full, she knew she had to keep on eating until all of the food was gone....

14211.content:
She dropped the bucket of wings and unscrewed the lid from one of the two-litre bottles of Coke. Gulping down a few mouthfulls, she felt the sugary liquid slosh down her throat and into her swelling stomach, before she put that aside too and grabbed a Twinkie, stuffing it into her mouth. She swallowed, then rubbed her aching belly through her coat; although she was a big eater, she'd never tried to consume this much in one go before and her body was complaining. She took another Twinkie and ate it as quickly as she coquld, then another, then a fourth. Of she ate fast enough, she didn't feel the pain so much. After forcing down the final Twinkie she took another long drink from the bottle of Coke, half-emptying it before putting the lid back on and dropping it to the carpet where it joined the discarded bucket of bones and several Twinkie wrappers.
With a long, agonised groan, she lay back on her bed, trying to ignore the feeling that someone had just jammed an entire watermelon down her throat and into her gut. With clumsy fingers, she unzipped her coat and jumper, then pulled up her shirt so she could massage herpoor tortured belly with both hands. It was swollen and distended, straining the button on her jeans. She undid it, sighing as some if the pressure was eased. Still, she couldn't bring herself to eat any more right now; she thought she might be sick if she tried. Suddenly, there was a knock at the door.
14211.title: Overstuffed

choices: After supper, she returns to her room.
During supper, she has trouble eating enough.
142111.content:
Suddenly, there was a sharp rapping at the door and Shea sat up, startled out of her food-dulled stupor.
"Uh, who's there?" She asked.
"It's me." Came her mom's voice through the wood. "Can I come in?"
"No! Er, I'm not feeling too well. I wouldn't want you to catch anything."
"Okay..." Said her mom bemusedly. "By the way Shea, do you know where the rest of the Twinkies went? And the bottles of Coke I was saving?"
Shea glanced around her bedroom at the remnants of the meal she had just eaten.
"Not a clue where they could be." She lied. "Have you asked Biddy? She loves Twinkies." Biddy was Shea's sister, younger by two years. Often she'd been caught trying to sneak food upstairs to eat, so hopefully she'd take the blame and not Shea.
"I'll ask her." Said her mom. "I'll be serving supper in a few minutes, so come down soon."
Shea swore under her breath; she hadn't realised it was so late, and if she didn't eat much her mom would know it had been her who'd taken the food! There was only one option; do her best to eat as much as she could, and hope no-one would notice. She rolled off the bed with a moan, then she shrugged out of her coat and sweater and dumped them on the floor as well. She needed to tidy everything up...
She began the process of hiding all the rubbish, stuffing the wrappers into an old jewellery box, the Coke in her wardrobe and the rest under her bed. Hopefully, that'd do.
Her shirt had ridden up with the activity, revealing her distended midriff. She poked it curiously, feeling an inch or two of flab, then her stuffed gut beneath. Was this really what Nick wanted? He had said he liked what he was seeing, so it must be. This meal was like a tournrmant, and victory meant winning the girl. Or guy, in this case.
Smiling to herself, she headed downstairs to eat with her family.

144.content:
Shea stood in front of her oval mirror in her bedroom giggling out loud to herself. "I am by far the cutest girl in my class, and with my new two tone knit aqua winter beanie cap and my matching Ancar brand coat to go with it, all the boys will notice me, especially David Sanders." Shea imagined David coming up to her and watching her with his adorable puppy dog brown eyes and freckled face looking at her and asking her out to the next school dance held next month.

Shea admired herself again in the mirror, and patted her noticeably rounded, pot-bellied stomach and brushed her wavy brown hair until it sparkled and snapped with electricity in it. "Ouch," she whimpered, shocking herself briefly and then ran downstairs quickly, hearing her Mom setting the table and smelling her favorite dish being cooked, lasagna with garlic bread and chocolate cake for dessert. "Mmmmm."

"Can I lick the bowl, mom?" Shea said at the same time grabbing the bowl she knew was sitting alone in the kitchen sink, full of chocolate batter just waiting for her to lick every morsel from the surface. Her mom laughed at her and said, "Okay, but aren't you going to change your clothes first?" "That coat won't look too pretty if you get it smeared with chocolate!" Shea rolled her eyes at her Mom. "No. Quit being a worry wart. Give me that bowl." Shea licked the bowl and then threw it back in the sink and looked back at her Mom finishing the final touches on her cooking. "How long until dinner?" "I am SO hungy I feel like I could pass out right now." Her mom held out her hand and said, "five minutes." Shea sat at the table watching her Mom finish putting the food on the table and watched her take the devils food cake out of the oven and set it on the table, and she could savor all of that food so much that she actually started salivating. "Food rules!" she thought. "I think I like food better than boys or at the very least they are a close tie." She laughed and then ran from the table and called her Father in to dinner like she did every night.

"Dad come on, it's time to eat. Hurry up! Chocolate cake tonight. Fresh out of the oven." Shea's Dad looked at her and rolled his eyes like he did every night, but then he ruffled her hair and said, "One day you might not be so eager to eat like you do, if you ever have a weight problem." "Have you thought about that, pumpkin?" She giggled. "Me have a weight problem? Never!" Then she looked down again at her pot belly tummy and shrugged her shoulders. Well, it is a possibility, but tonight bring on the food.

After gorging herself on three helpings of lasagna dinner with two large slices of cake, she let out a loud burp and sighed and realized she was a bit sick to her stomach. Maybe she should have omitted that cake batter before she ate. Oh well, she thought. "I'll take a Tums and go lie down for 15 minutes and I'll be okay."

Running up to her bedroom, she grabbed the Tums off of her bedroom dresser and took three Tums and then jumped on her unmade bed and grabbed the new book she had gotten at the library yesterday at school and was part way through the book, when she felt herself becoming sleepy and lazy and she drifted off to sleep for about 30 minutes. She felt a strange rumble in her stomach and looked at her tummy. Her stomach was as big as if she had stuffed three pillows underneath her shirt. "Oh my goodness!" "What is going on?" "I feel like Violet from Willie Wonka and the Chocolate Factory, who got so big she burst. "I don't want that to happen to me.!"

She ran to the adjoining bathroom to her room and hopped on the scale. Shea knew hew normal weight was 95 pounds. The scales now showed that she was 145 pounds. "No way I am 145 pounds! No way!"

She started screaming and calling to her parents downstairs and yelled down to them to come upstairs and check on her. "Mom, Dad, come quick! Something is seriously wrong with my stomach!"

When her Mom met Shea at the top of the stairs, her Mother said, "I can't believe this would happen again in our family." "It ______
