1452.content:
"But Mom, I don't want to!" Shea said.

"Shea, don't make this hard, please. There's no other choice. We took this job, so we need to go and we just can't take you with us. We are glad Aunt Yenna said she wanted to take care of you. Now you can live with her!"

"And I need to leave all my friends behind. I don't wanna move!"

"Well, here is better then coming with us. You'll have friends before you know it. I heard there are a lot of kids in the neighborhood. In five weeks, school starts. I know you're a bit worried, but I'm sure you'll like Aunt Yenna."

"I hardly know her!"

"True, we didn't visit often. But she often took care of kids if their parents went on vacation for a few weeks. She loves children!"

"Then why doesn't she have children of her own?"

"I don't know. She also never married. She always said that man only like woman for sex...."

"That's not true. Not entirely. I mean sure some men but not all. I mean Nick doesn't want me only for sex..."

She felt a sharp pain when she thought about Nick, her crush. Now that she moved, he would probably forget her and find a new girl.

"Ah, maybe Nick can visit you. Besides don't make drama about it. You also broke up with Zack, right?"

"Yeah he wanted to have sex with me!"

Her mother almost drove the car off the street and looked at her.

"You're eleven!"

"Yeah, so that's why I broke up with him!"

She really wanted a boyfriend. Lately her body was starting to change. Two months ago she got her first period and her mother was so happy with it and lately also her boobs started to grow. Some other girls in her class were so jealous. They were't too big yet. She didn't needed a bra but still they were noticeable even while wearing a sweater.

"Look there it is!" Her mother said.

Shea could't believe it. The house was way bigger then her parents house. She thought there was enough room for a family with four kids and grandma.
Shea and her mother got out of the car and Shea's mother rang the doorbell.

"It's nice weather here. You can go to the beach maybe. It's a short walk from here!"

She must admit it was nice weather. She was a white T-shirt with short sleeves and short pants.

"I prefer the winter...."

The door opened and a blond chubby woman opened. Shea looked with an open mouth. Sure, it was about five years since she last saw her aunt but still, now she saw her, Shea thought she looked beautiful. Sure she was a bit chubby but surely not fat with big firm DD breasts. She had perfect skin with pearl white teeth and long blond hair that fell like a waterfall over her shoulders with nice long perfect legs.

Shea wondered how was it possible she never found a man. She bet she could find hundreds of men who would want to go out with her. She also seemed pretty young, somewhere around 25. Could be? It was her father's younger sister and her father called Yenna always his baby sister and her father was about 33 years old.

"Shea! Nice to see you again." Yenna said. "The last time i saw you you were playing with stuffed animals!"

Even her voice sounded perfect, Shea thought.

"Nice to see you too." Shea mumbled.

"I understand you're not so happy that your parents are going away and leaving you here but give it some time. I'm sure you gonna like it here. Let's do our best!"

Well that sounded pretty good. Shea must admit. Yenna at least understood that Shea wasn't too happy about this.
Her mother was busy getting Shea's stuff out. She also gave Yenna a list with some rules.

"It's so nice you wanted to take care of her!"

"It's no problem really. She's my niece after all. I have too much room anyway and I get a bit lonely so it's really fine having a young girl to keep me company, and her friends when they come over!"

Shea's mother kissed and hugged Shea tight before she drove off.

"So what do you wanna do first?" Yenna asked.

"Well, I haven't eaten in a little while, but I want to see my room. Can I see my room and then eat some food?" Shea asked, wondering if her cooking was as perfect as her looks.

"Sure! Give me an hour or two to make you an amazing meal! In the mean time, why don't you just go and unpack some stuff and I'll make a feast that you will love?" Aunt Yenna said to her niece.

She had the complexion of a skinny person, but had a belly sticking out. After speeding up the stairs, Shea entered her room and had her mouth gaped open. Her room was huge! Her room was twice the size of her old room and has big as her kitchen, which is bigger than a normal room. Her room was purple, her favorite color, and her room had a balcony, which gave her a view of the sea. All around her room, she saw that her Aunt had set jars of candy around for Shea. This women really understood Shea well for not seeing her that much. Shea's bed was king sized with purple and blue sheets. Shea jumped on her bed and began to smile, loving her new room.

After enjoying her bed and room, Shea began to unpack her stuff. The first thing she went through was her clothes. She had a lot of long sleeve and winter clothing. For some reason, she liked winter clothing better than summer clothes. She hung up her clothes and even hung up her favorite winter hat on her bed post.

14521.title: Shea Sees Her Room

145212.content:
Her aunt yelled dinner was ready.

"Hmmm I wonder if Aunt Yenna's food taste just as good as she looks. Anyway, it smells delicious!" Shea said as she ran downstairs and into the kitchen.

"Hello Shea! I'm really glad you decided to come here. I hope you like your room. If you don't like it, we could look for another room. I have several rooms..."

"What are you talking about?! My room is terrific. I love it! I love purple and I love candy!"

"Oh yeah! I heard you liked candy so I decided to buy some for you. If you want, I also could put a T.V in your room. I have one I'm not doing anything with. Of course only if you want it!" Aunt Yenna said to Shea.

Shea slowly started to smile. She always wanted a T.V in her room, but her parents were against it. Now, she was just offered one! Just less then two hours ago, she hated coming here and now, it seemed like this was terrific!

"I would like a T.V. Can I have some of that food? It smells good!" Shea asked, noticing the food sitting on the counter.

"Oh of course dear!"

Aunt Yenna put a big bowl on table while Shea followed to the table. It had a yellow crust. Shea looked curious at it. She couldn't remember seeing anything like it.

"Be careful honey! The bowl is still hot. It's a gratin. It's made from potatoes, cheese, onion, cream, bacon... Oh my, you're not a vegetarian are you?"

"No I'm not a vegetarian. I love meat. It smells delicious!" Shea said, loving the smell of the food.

Shea picked up her knife and fork and took a small bite. She slowly chewed it and discovered it tasted delicious. This was great. Aunt Yenna was a really great cook. If she cooked like this everyday, she wouldn't mind staying here. Delicious food, a huge room in her favorite color, candy, a T.V, and a sea nearby.

"I could get used to this! But still I do miss my friends. Especially my crush, Nick. He's so cool. But now I'm gone, I'm sure he'll find a new girl."

Shea and her friends of course talked about guys and she and her female friends all thought Nick looked cool.

"Well I'm afraid I can't help you with that. But you know, sometimes you lose friends. That's too bad, but that's how it goes. Can't do anything about it. But you'll also get new friends. You know there are a lot of children around here. A lot go to your new school. But well, you still have five weeks vacation so you have time to know some of them. Maybe you can have a slumber party. I hope you don't mind but I might have told some kids you would come to live here. I think you get a lot of new friends here. Most kids here are pretty nice. The girls were happy I told them you were also a girl," Aunt Yenna said as Shea shoved forkful and forkful full of food.

"I thought you liked it here," Sandy said.

"I do, Rapunzel. I do. It's not the place. It's the way they did it. It's like saying that their job is more important than their child. I just needed to accept it. So they need to accept my weight gain or else they shouldn't have left me here," Shea said as she felt frustrated.

"Yeah. So I don't mind what they think about my weight because I like it. Besides, with the food my aunt makes, it's hard not to gain. It's very nice this way," Shea said.

The girl that spoke was busy watering some flowers. She had some flowers in her hair as she wore some blue dungarees and a white shirt with long sleeves and a jacket.

"Hi Karen," Emily said. "Shea this is Karen. Karen, this is Shea. She just moved here!"

"Oh yeah. You're the flower girl," Shea said.

"Flower girl?" Karen asked. "Never heard that nickname before. Well it sounds better than weed girl. I like that nickname; flower girl. So where do you live?"

"With my Aunt Yenna. Do you know her?" Shea asked.

"Don't be impressed about that," Jane said. "We all know everyone who lives here. We were all born and raised here. In a village like this, you soon start to know everyone. We all do," Jane continued.

"What a nice girl," Shea said.

"You also have Triple M," Jane said. "They are three boys named Mark, Max and Matt. They think they're funny but they're kind of lame," Jane said.

"But not as lame as their jokes," Sandy said. "But you don't need to be careful with them. They're just annoying!" Sandy said.

"But enough about them. How fat are you planning to get?" Jane asked.

"Well I must admit I don't know. I never really thought about it. I guess I will just keep gaining and I will see where it ends. But it will take some time," Shea said as she smiled and held Emily's hand.

"Same here," Emily said.

"Look! There's the beach," Sandy said.

"What?" Shea and Emily said.

"I agree," said Sandy. "I mean, I am big, too, but I don't want to gain as bad as you two. What do you say?" Sandy asked them as Jane joined.

Shea and Emily thought about it for a few moments until Shea broke the silence.

"I'm up for it," Shea said with a grin.

She felt some sort of shock through her body. It felt great for her as if it pleasured her. She knew for sure there were sparks flying around them. Then, just as fast as it happened, it stopped. However, she still felt the butterflies.

"You also never went out with either one of them," Shea smiled.

Of course, you will have Victoria. She'll hate you and maybe one or two others, but that's it. About those boobs... after a few years, they will have them, too. All she had to do was wait. Shea kept on watching while they all talked to each other to make the time fly by. Deep down, Shea wondered if Emily dying her hair was a bad idea. But if Emily wanted to do it, she wasn't going to stop her. In some way, she was a little excited for Emily to look like her.

"Finished!" Leo said as he backed away from Emily.

As Emily sat up to face the mirror, she opened her eyes.

"Oh my gosh! It's perfect!" Emily said with a grin as she grabbed her new hair.

Her hair was the perfect shade of brown, matching Shea's hair color to the tee. On top of that, he even made her hair wavy just like Shea's hair was. The girls now really looked similar to one another, especially since they were both gaining weight. Overall, Emily was pleased.

"I like it a lot! We look alike!" Shea said as she touched Emily's shoulder.

"I told you he does great!" Carlie said to the girls.

"How much do I owe you?" Emily asked Leo.

"Just give me eight dollars and we will be good," Leo said with a grin.

Emily handed Leo the eight bucks as they all walked downstairs and thanked Leo.

"Let me know if you need anything else, girls!" Leo said as the girls walked out of the house.

"Man, he is awesome!" Carlie said as they all began walking.

"Totally!" Shea said agreeing.

"Definitely! Now let's go clothes shopping!" Emily said.

choices: They Do Some More Stuff In The Village
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
For Shea, it was a bit strange having all stores on one street. There were stores on both sides, but no where else in the area was a store except for a barber and two stores that Carlie and Emily said that it seemed like they had never been open. For Shea, it was totally different. She grew up in the city with hundreds of stores that were not just on one street.

"I guess it's different from where you come from, isn't it?" Carlie said.

"Oh yeah. I forgot. You come from the city," Emily said. "Guess you must think it's boring here!"

"So this is where you do well... all the shopping. Only on this street?" Shea asked.

"No way, but this is where we do most normal shopping. You know... groceries, the T.V guide, a new pencil. But sometimes, our mothers go with us to the next town to shop there," Carlie said.

"Yeah. Because they think we are too young to go over there on our own," Emily said in a grumpy voice.

"Well, if I need to be honest, if you go over there to party, it can become pretty late. And if you need to wait for the bus in the dark... well there are pretty creepy guys out there who love a beautiful young girl like us. They are ready for the raping. I also heard in a documentary that they even like it more if the victim is still a virgin. The idea that our mothers don't want to let us go on our own probably isn't so strange!"

"But it isn't so bad here. We have here every store we need," Emily said while she walked in the clothing store.

"Do you need some clothes?" Carlie asked.

"Nah. I got a box full from my Aunt... but I could use a few bras," Shea said. I hope they have a few here!"

Shea looked in the store for bras and suddenly saw some of the clothes Emily picked. If she needed to be honest, they were exactly the same clothes she would pick. She took a better look and noticed that two of the t-shirt were exactly the same as the ones she had. Emily took the twin thing very serious.

"She looks very good with the same hair like you. It's kind of funny if you think about the fact that her hair is done by somebody who works with make up for horror movies!"

"Do you like horror movies?" Shea asked while she found some bras that would probably fit her.

"Oh yeah, but my mother doesn't want me to see them. She thinks it's too scary for me. But sometimes, Leo shows me one or two!"

Shea took six bras and went to the fitting room. She was relieved when she found out they fitted her perfectly. She hoped that Emily wouldn't find it a problem that she bought bras. She decided that she could better pay for them already. After she bought them, she went back and saw Emily showing one of her new outfits. She turned around so you could take a good look at her.

"Terrific. It suits you perfectly!" Carlie said.

"Yeah! Great," Shea said who also looked to see if they were a bit wide so Emily would have some room to grow.

A few minutes later, the three girls left the store, two of them with bags.

"Why didn't you buy any clothes, Carlie?" Emily asked.

"Because I don't need new clothes and I don't care that much about clothes. Also, I don't have money for them right about now."

choices: Fast Forward To Later That Night

After they shopped for some clothes, they all headed back to Shea's house. When they got in, Aunt Yenna greeted them warmly.

"How's it going, girls?" Aunt Yenna asked.

"Great! Just did some girl things," Shea said.

"I can see. Emily, I like the new hair! You look identical to Shea," Aunt Yenna said.

"Oh yeah. Carlie took us to this guy named Leo who can dye hair well," Emily said.

"Leo's a funny guy. I've seen him around here before," Aunt Yenna commented.

"Hey Aunt Yenna. Can you please make us some lunch?" Shea asked politely.

"Sure! I can have it ready for you all in the next hour. I'll call for you," Aunt Yenna said with a grin.

"Thank you!" All the girls said as they headed up to Shea's room.

When they got up to her room, they sat the bags on the ground and turned on some music. Emily headed for the computer, Carlie headed for Shea's closet, and Shea headed for a jar of M & M's while laying on her bed. For the next bit, the girls talked about fashion, celebrity gossip, and about how much they disliked Victoria. During this time, Emily was on the computer looking at more clothes. She found a few websites that had Shea's clothes. What she found that made her really happy was a website that made hats. There were literally thousands of them. After a little bit of searching, Emily found all the winter hats that Shea had, which would help make her look more like Shea's twin. Meanwhile, Carlie was looking through Shea's clothes to see what she had. She noticed some smaller clothing.

"Shea, this outfit looks so small," Carlie said while holding it up. It was a navy blue shirt that was so skinny, Carlie could wear it.

"Wow. I wore that when I moved over here. I was really small then. Now, I'm just getting obese," Shea said as she patted her bigger belly.

"Do you mind if I took some of your smaller clothes so they won't go to waste?" Carlie asked politely.

"Sure. Be my guest," Shea said while munching on more candy.

"I got to say, you really have nice clothes," Carlie said. She noticed some of Shea's hats as well and tried on a white one with tassels and a big white puff ball on top. After a few minutes, she took it off and continued looking through Shea's clothes.

"I try my best. I mean, I'm getting bigger, but I do still like to have some nice clothing," Shea said as she noticed Emily on the computer.

"Hey Emily. What are you doing?" Shea asked.

"I'm just looking at some clothing online to buy. I've found some good stuff," Emily said with a grin.

"Speaking of good stuff, how's Leonard?" Carlie asked Shea.

"He's doing well. Hopefully, we will go on another date soon. I just need to wait and see," Shea said as she let out a burp. All of the girls started to giggle.

Well, that girl made clothes for herself and she was fat. But the clothes were nice and all... you know what I mean?" Carlie asked.

However, that main character designs her own clothes, which are clothes for fat people. Personally, I thought they looked really good!"

Luckily, her mother saw what happened and turned it off or else she would have lost her finger. But nonetheless, she had scars to remember it. She also got a hatred for sewing. But maybe designing clothes was okay. As long as she didn't need to sew them. Designing could be pretty fun. During art class, she always liked to give characters on her drawings nice clothing.

"Girls! Lunch is ready!" Aunt Yenna yelled.

Shea and Emily quickly ran downstairs. Carlie looked surprised.

"How is it possible that such large people can move so fast?" She asked to herself as she lifted her shoulders and then went after her friends.

She couldn't believe it when she saw all the food on the table. There was so much. She had a bit trouble wondering if the three of them could eat all that, but then decided she better first get something to eat before her two obese girlfriends ate all the food. Aunt Yenna smiled when seeing how the girls enjoyed her food. She was glad she offered her sibling to take care of Shea. Shea seemed to have a great time here and she really liked having Shea and her friends over. Before, she had been lonely sometimes. Now, there was at least someone home instead of arriving in a empty house. She also hoped that Shea would ask her on advice later for things like dating and school work.

In the meantime, the girls stuffed themselves like there was no tomorrow. Well, at least Shea and Emily did. Carlie ate just her normal small portions. Her Mom never understood how she had so much energy while she ate so little.

Shea must admit that they didn't look bad considering she bought this about fourteen years ago. They were still in pretty good shape.
She took some panties and thought one moment about if she should wear a bra or not. Since her boobs were bigger and since she went on a date and her t-shirt might get messy, she decided to wear one just to look a bit more presentable. If she kept gaining like this and her boobs would keep growing, then she really would need to wear one everyday. This thought made her smile while she looked for a loose white t-shirt, which was a bit hard since her clothes were getting more tight than getting looser. But finally, she found an old one somewhere in the back of her closet. She also took some long pants.
Leonard told her to take some winter clothing. She decided to take that in a bag. It was not that she minded wearing them, but outside, it was still pretty warm and she didn't want to be all sweaty on her date. Except maybe for her hat. She just liked to wear it. Besides, there were also other people who like to wear hats or caps. So why not a winter hat? She thought one moment and also took a second t-shirt. If her first got really messy, she could always put on another one.

"Hm I wonder what Victoria is doing today. She doesn't know about the date, but perhaps we will see her on the way. She won't like it, but I don't really care what she thinks!"

Shea walked over to her mirror. She decided to put on just a bit make up. She put on just enough to look nice, but not enough to really notice it except maybe the lipstick.
She also brushed her hair and looked in the mirror. It looked nice and brushed once more through her hair.
Then she heard the door bell.

"It's for me!" Shea yelled.

Shea ran down the stairs, taking two steps together, and jumped the last three steps.
She brushed through her hairs and opened the door. There was Leonard.

"Hi Shea. Wow! You look fantastic!"

Shea doubted that many people would say that to a girl wearing elastic clothing and a loose white t-shirt.

"You have your winter clothes?" Leonard asked.

"Yeah, I have them right in this bag, but I decided since it's pretty warm to put them on there or else I will sweat before we are there!"

"Yeah, that's a good idea. I would look a bit strange wearing coats and gloves in the summer," Leonard said.

They walked outside and Shea took the time to look around. She liked the houses here and the people. Some people who were outside greeted them friendly. Shea must admit that they were way more friendly than some people in her old neighborhood. She hardly knew the people there. At some places, she could smell the weed all the way from the street. But she doubted anyone here used weed or drugs. Leonard took her right through the middle of the village.
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: Getting Ready For The Second Date

choices: They Go To The Back And Stuff Shea With Ice Cream
Shea Starts To Pig Out Like Crazy
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
As they walked through the village, the two held hands and looked around until they had reached the main street. Even though it looked old fashioned, there were still many places. Immediately, Shea spotted the ice cream parlor that Leonard had talked about earlier. As they approached the door, Leonard went to get out a pair of keys. Shea noted how it was dark inside from being closed that day. The next minute, Leonard opened the door and walked Shea inside.

"Well, Shea, what do you think?" Leonard asked.

Shea started to look around when Leonard turned on the lights to the place. Shea noticed that it was definitely a place for families to hang out because of the rainbow colors, pictures of ice cream, and even some arcade games to top it off. But overall, Shea felt the place had a friendly vibe to it.

"It's really nice, Leonard. I like it already," Shea grinned.

"Good. Well, I'm going to see if my Uncle left me any notes around here. Go ahead and get into your winter clothes," Leonard said with a grin as he walked to the back.

Quickly, Shea opened her bag and started to take out her stuff. To start with, Shea put on her winter jacket and zipped it up, making her look more fat. Following that, Shea put on a pair of matching gloves that had a soft texture to the touch. Finally, Shea put on her favorite winter hat and pulled it down on her head. She then looked at herself in a mirror nearby and began to make sure she looked perfect for Leonard. Minutes later, Leonard walked in and saw Shea.

"I found the note. And wow. Even when you are covered up like this, you still look good," Leonard said as he and Shea got closer.

"Thanks. This is my favorite clothing," Shea said with a grin as she pulled her hat down more and inched closer to Leonard.

Spontaniously, the two began to kiss each other, just enjoying their privacy. A minute later, they pulled back and slowly laughed as Leonard began to speak.

"Let the date begin!"
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: They Arrived At The Ice Cream Parlor

1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
"You said you had ice cream," Shea said.

"Of course. This is a ice cream parlor. Come on. Follow me," Leonard said.

It was obvious Leonard had been here more often. He knew exactly which way he needed to go and where the light switch was. They finally reached a thick door.

"This is the freezer," Leonard said while he pushed a button. "Alright. When we get in, we need to close the door again or else it gets warm in here and then all the other food will spoil. So... ready? Let's go," Leonard said with a smile.

Leonard opened the door. Shea felt the cold air in her face. Quickly, she stepped inside and was followed by Leonard who closed the door the moment they went inside. Shea looked around. Shea knew some restaurants had big freezers, but this one seemed very big. Shea was glad she put on winter clothing since it was very cold in here. Shea could see her breath.

"Over here!" Leonard said.

He was standing on the other side of the freezer by a shelf with a few different boxes of ice cream. Shea walked over to him and read the labels.

"Strawberry, chocolate, vanilla, mint, banana, forest fruit, coconut, mango," Shea said as she stopped reading for a moment.

"Yeah. Everything at this shelf needs to be taken out. After that, I need to take a few boxes from that other shelf over there. My Uncle told me how he wanted that, but you don't have to do that. But let's take your food outside," Leonard said.

Both grabbed some boxes and put them next to the door. After that, Leonard put a few boxes from the other shelf on the free made shelf. He checked it a few times. Shea waited patiently. She started to get really hungry. She didn't eat anything this day since she knew she would get a lot of ice cream, but with her new food intake, her body wasn't used to being without food for so long. But she decided to wait until he was finished.
She looked a moment at the boxes of ice cream for her and must admit she didn't suspect it was so many. Thinking about how much they weighed, they must be almost full.

"So that's done. Now back to what's really important," Leonard said with a smile while he walked back to Shea. "Alright. I'll open the door and you'll hand me the boxes," Leonard said.

"How much ice cream would fit in here?" Shea asked and slapped her belly.

"Well let's find out," Leonard said excitedly.

He opened the door and walked outside, already taking a few boxes. Shea handed him the boxes as fast as she could. When she was done, she walked out of the freezer and closed the door. Leonard pushed the button another time.

"What's that button for?" Shea asked curiously.

"The light switch," Leonard said.

Leonard grabbed a cart and put the boxes on it. He wheeled it back to the eating place. Shea went sitting and took her jacket and gloves of. She didn't need them there.

"Alright. Which one do you want to taste first?" Leonard asked.

"What does it matter? They are all going to end up in the same place," Shea said with a wide grin.

"Eh Shea... is it okay if I... feed you? If you don't want to, it's fin..."

"I would love it if you would feed me. I would like that a lot," Shea said.

Leonard got red, grabbed a spoon, and opened the first box of ice cream. Shea opened her mouth wide and Leonard pushed a full spoonful in her mouth. Shea felt like she was in heaven.
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: The Freezer

choices: After Shea Finishes With Chocolate, They Talk And Want To Try Something For Fun
A Couple Of Hours Later, They Have Gone Through All Of The Ice Cream
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
All Shea could feel was spoonful after spoonful of ice cream going down her throat. She could taste the richness of the ice cream and savored the flavor. The first one that Leonard began to feed her was vanilla. The whole time, Shea just closed her eyes and let Leonard do the feeding. Shea would just lean her head back and let out a moan of bliss from the ice cream. Multiple spoonfuls had entered Shea's mouth and one could tell from the amount of ice cream that was over her face. Shea looked like a sloppy pig with all of her loose clothes, her winter hat on, and with ice cream smeared around her face. She especially loved the feeling of the cold ice cream reaching the bottom of her stomach. After a half hour of eating, Leonard had reached the bottom of the vanilla ice cream box.

"Hey Shea, you finished one," Leonard said with a grin.

Shea opened her eyes, feeling like she was still in a sedated state. She could eat more ice cream, but Shea did feel stuffed from the first batch.

"Good. That's so delicious. That's the best ice cream I have ever had," Shea said.

"I am glad you like it. We could do this more often," Leonard said with a grin.

Shea smiled, thinking about how lucky she was as Leonard got another bin of ice cream ready, which made Shea wonder something.

"Leonard, out of all the girls in this town, why me? What made you like me so much?" Shea asked with a small grin.

"Well, for one thing, I love how fat you are. And don't take that offensively. I think you are the prettiest girl I have ever seen. That, and you are not like the other girls here. Some can be nice, but many are not as caring and bright spirited as you. No matter what, I feel so happy around you and you constantly move me, Shea," Leonard said, making Shea feel like the happiest girl on earth as if hearts were being shown in her eyes.

Leonard then sat next to Shea on her side of the both as they began to kiss. Shea had never felt so happy in her life.

"Wow. You take my breath away," Shea said.

"I try my best," Leonard smiled.

"Hey Leonard, do you mind if.... well.... I wanted to try and eat this ice cream differently just to see if you like it. After this bucket, you could feed me normally again. Is that okay?" Shea asked.

"Sure. Anything for you," Leonard smiled as he put a bucket of chocolate ice cream in front of Shea, making her smile.

Quickly, Shea stuck her head into the bucket of ice cream, eating the ice cream like a dog would eat out of a bowl. Shea was making a pig of herself, getting her face and hat messy with chocolate stains. Shea was feeling like she was in ecstasy as Leonard watched and smiled at his girlfriend.
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: Feeding Shea The Ice Cream

choices: Shea Tells About Her Parents And Past
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
Shea was so happy. There was at this moment nothing else for her than her, Leonard, and the ice cream. She didn't even notice how full she was getting. Hours went by and some ice cream already melted and Shea could drink the melted stuff, instantly loving it. Slowly, but surely, all the ice cream found its way to Shea's stomach. She didn't notice this until Leonard stopped feeding her.

"Hey! Why did you stop?" She asked disappointedly.

"There's no ice cream left," Leonard said calmly.

"What? That can't be! I can't have eaten all of it!" Shea screamed.

She looked around and saw all the empty boxes of ice cream. She then noticed her shirt that was covered in ice cream stains and her huge belly. Shea suddenly noticed that her pants weren't buttoned anymore. It seemed her button popped off and she didn't even notice it. She looked at her huge bloated belly. She suddenly noticed how stuffed she was and wondered how she had been able to eat so much ice cream.

"I never thought you would be able to eat all of it," Leonard said surprised. "Sure, I knew you could eat a lot, but this much? It's really unbelievable. By the way, I found your pants button. I thought you might want to get it back. I'm sure your Aunt can put it back on. She is good with a sewing machine," Leonard said.

"I hate sewing machines. I once got my finger stuck in one," Shea said.

"Ouch! I'm sure that was kind of painful," Leonard said.

"Oh, tell me about it. It took some time before my finger fully healed. But I kept some scars to remind me about it. Ever since then, I'm not such a big fan of sewing. It's one of my most painful moments," Shea said.

"I must say I enjoyed feeding you all the ice cream. I thought it was a perfect date. You saw this like a date, right?"

"You bet I saw this like a date. A perfect date. Our second date. Both were great," Shea said.

"Well I must admit I told my parents about you. Hope you don't mind," Leonard said.

Of course I don't, silly. But you didn't tell them what happened at my room, did you?" Shea asked feeling scared.

"No! Of course not. I don't think my parents would be happy with that. They won't be angry at you, but at me. But anyway, they wanted to meet you during a dinner. I promised them I would ask you seeing when you can come," Leonard said.

"Well I don't know," Shea mumbled. "I mean, I do want to meet your parents, but I'm not sure if Aunt Yenna planned anything. But as long as she hasn't... I would love to come. But warn you mother that I'm a big eater!"

She tried to stand up, but fell back down on her chair with her fat butt.

"Oh! I'm too full to stand. BUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRP!!! Oh! Excuse me. Give me some time to digest this food," Shea said.

"Sure. But since you're going to meet my parents, tell me in the meantime something about your parents. What I also wondered was did you always have a big belly?" Leonard asked.

"Well... alright. I will tell you," Shea said.
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: A Dinner With My Parents

choices: After A Little While, They Head To Leonard's House
They Kick Things Up A Notch
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
"You see, my parents and I used to live with each other for a while. I mean, when I was younger, they were always there for me. In some ways, they even spoiled me. I mean, being an only child, they did everything I asked for the most part. Every year, my Mom and I would go on shopping sprees. She got me into clothes, especially winter clothes. I have always liked that fashion," Shea said as she pointed to her hat and jacket. Suddenly, she took a second and burped.

"Sorry," Shea said with a grin.

"It's okay. Continue," Leonard said with a grin.

"Anyway, so when I was younger, let's say five, I was a twig. I was probably one of the skinniest girls in my school. But then, I kept on liking sugar. I would consume more and more with my parents letting me at free will. Overtime, I put on a bunch of weight. By the time I was about eight, I was at least twenty pounds overweight," Shea said with surprise.

"Really? Well, what happened then?" Leonard asked.

"Well, I had a hard time staying fit and my parents noticed. So, my parents began putting me in sports and changed my diet. I hated sports and I felt like I barely ate anything. I mean, I would usually sneak food as much as I could. Anyway, after a while, I quit sports and my parents were starting to shift my diet to normal. I had lost a decent amount of weight, but I was still chubby. I was as chubby as I was when I came here," Shea said.

"Wow. Well, I'm happy I helped you gain more to break your limits," Leonard said, making Shea laugh.

"Yeah. I am too. But anyway, after a while, my parents had more to do. My Dad was able to own his own business and my Mom helped out, leaving me alone a lot, hence how my diet started to shift. They became so busy, they decided to expand their company. My Dad one day told me that he and my Mom had to leave for a while, but they were not sure how long. I resented them for it because they left me behind. But now, I'm happy that they did. I got to meet my amazing Aunt, new friends, and you," Shea said with a grin.

"I am glad, too," Leonard said.

"When I was with my parents, I had met this boy named Nick. He liked me and basically cheated on me when I left. He became fatter though and just forgot about me. I am just so happy that you won't do that to me," Shea said, making Leonard smile.

Leonard then wrapped his arm around Shea and smiled.

"I will never do that to you," Leonard said, reaching in for a passionate kiss, which covered his face in ice cream.

"Sorry! Your face is going to be sticky now!" Shea pointed out.

"I don't care," Leonard grinned, continuing to kiss her.
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: About Her Parents And Past

choices: Something Else That Is Your Choice
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
They kissed a bit more as Shea felt again a huge amount of butterflies. She felt way more than she ever felt with Nick. To be honest, she totally forgot about him or any good moments with him. Not any moment with him went half as well as with Leonard. But with Nick, he wasn't feeding her. Of course, back then, she didn't try to gain. But feeding her felt so good just like stuffing herself. She liked all those things, which were things she never did before. Perhaps it was meant that she became a fat girl. That God (if he existed) made her to be a fat girl. That would be nice.

"Eh Shea... if you want, you can meet my parents right now. They're at home. Then we can have that dinner a few days after that," Leonard said.

"I would love to, but I think I better first change my shirt," Shea said with a grin.

Shea first pulled off her dirty hat. She then pulled off her shirt and used it like a napkin to clean her face. After that, she looked in her bag for a clean shirt she took. Leonard blushed seeing Shea in her bra. Shea noticed it.

"Oh, come on. You saw me naked already. So what does it matter if you see me in my bra?" Shea asked. "I must admit I feel a lot better now. At least I can walk," Shea said with a giggle.

Leonard pulled Shea up. Shea looked at the mess on the table.

"Eh... don't we need to clean that up? I don't think you Uncle would like it if... "

"Don't worry. I'll clean it up tomorrow morning before he comes," Leonard said.

They walked through the small streets to Leonard's house.

"I hope your parents like me. Do they mind that you're dating a fat girl?"

"No way. To tell you the truth, my Mom likes girls with a healthy appetite. She doesn't really likes those anorexic girls that only drink mineral water and think they're already overweight if they gain a single ounce. No, my Mom likes it more when the girl is more like... you. She does like it if the girl is fat. That's why I dared to tell her about the fact I loved fat girls. She was happy to hear it. A good thing, too," Leonard said.

"How about your Dad?"

"Well, that's a funny thing, too. My Dad was very close with his Uncle. His Uncle used to travel a lot and told my Dad stories about natives and wild animals. Sounded like he had a really exciting life. My Dad adored him. Anyway, he told me that those natives didn't like the thought that fat was ugly. Over there, it was seen like beauty and a sign of wealth. My Uncle started to think this way, too. This way, my Dad also never saw fat girls as ugly. We're here," Leonard said.

Shea put on big eyes. This building was so big. She suspected that this was city hall or a museum, but Leonard opened the door.

"You... you live here?" Shea asked surprised.

"Yeah. It's way too big, but my parents like it. It's their..."

He was interrupted by a high voice and running footsteps as Shea saw a young, fat girl running over to Leonard with her fat belly jiggling.

"Leonard! Leonard! You're home!" She yelled and jumped in his arms.

It's a good thing Leonard is so strong, Shea said to herself.

"Oh yeah! I also have a little sister. This is Hillary. She also has a healthy appetite," Leonard smiled.

I can see that, Shea thought while looking at Hillary's big belly.
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: What Do Your Parents Think About Dating A Fat Girl

choices: Leonard Gives Shea The Grand Tour
Skip To Dinner With Leonard's Family
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
As they walked into the house, Shea noticed how nice the place was around her. She couldn't believe that Leonard had the luxury of living in such a house with high ceilings, glass items around, and also a place that had a friendly touch to it that would not intimidate a person.

"Leonard, Mom and Dad are in the kitchen if you need them. Who is this?" Hillary asked.

"Thanks. And this is Shea. She's my girlfriend," Leonard said with a grin to Shea.

"She's bigger than me!" Hillary said in a shocked tone.

"Don't worry, Hillary! You'll be bigger someday. Now go ahead and play with your dolls upstairs," Leonard said in a positive tone as Hillary began to waddle upstairs. Shea grinned.

"You are so good with kids. And she's your sister!" Shea said, feeling shocked that he was so calm with his sister. Normally, siblings were more vulgar towards each other. Leonard, however, seemed nuturing.

"I do what I can. Now come on. Let's meet my parents," Leonard said as he walked Shea to the kitchen.

As soon as Shea walked in, she noticed the smells of food being prepared. She looked over towards the oven and noticed a lady in a white apron preparing the food. She wasn't fat, but she wasn't completely skinny. A moment later, Shea realized who the lady was.

"Leonard, dear! How was your day?" Asked the lady.

"Hey, Mom. It was great. I just spent the day with Shea. Shea, this is my Mom. Mom, this is Shea," Leonard said as he introduced the two.

"Nice to meet you. I've heard a lot of good things about you. I've also heard of your healthy appetite!" Leonard's Mom said to Shea.

"It's very nice to meet you, too. And thank you for having me over," Shea said with a smile.

A moment later, a man walked into the kitchen. Again, this man was not fat, but was not skinny as he supported a smaller belly on his frame.

"Is this Shea, Leonard? She looks like she eats well. That's how I thought of it," Leonard's Dad said as he proceeded to shake Shea's hand.

"It's nice to meet you too, sir," Shea said.

"Leonard, why don't you show Shea around the house? I'll have dinner ready in a few minutes! Shea, make yourself at home for the time being!" Leonard's Mom said as she continued to cook dinner.

"Thank you! Nice to meet you both!" Shea said as Leonard and herself walked out of the kitchen.
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: Meeting Leonard's Parents

choices: Something Else That Is Your Choice
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
"Well what do you think about my parents?" Leonard asked.

"They seem really nice," Shea said.

"Well, I'll show you around the house. After that, we can have dinner if you want, of course," Leonard said.

"Sure. I would like that. I only hope you have enough food. But I'm still pretty stuffed from all the ice cream. So I probably won't eat that much," Shea said.

"Yeah. My parents wanted to invite you and your Aunt. But since you're here now, they can first meet you and after that, we can have that dinner with you and your Aunt. My parents are nice, but sometimes, they care a bit too much about my life," Leonard said.

"At least they didn't drop you off with some relative you hardly know in a place were you don't know anybody," Shea said.

"Yeah. A place without a shopping center, without clubs, and without a movie theater. That's what most kids out of the big city say," Leonard admitted.

"I don't really care about those things too much. Don't get me wrong. This village and the people here are all very nice except for Victoria. But my parents and I didn't know that. It might have been just as well if most people here were awful. Besides, I hardly knew my Aunt. But anyway, I thought you would show me around the house?"

While saying this, Shea suddenly remembered she didn't see all rooms in Aunt Yenna's house. She really needed to do that once.

"Well this is the living room and this is the dinner room," Leonard said while he lead her around the house.

She was surprised. It seemed like Leonard had anything he wanted while she saw all rooms he showed her. He brought her upstairs and opened a door while he said: "Hillary's room!"

Shea smiled. Hillary was having a tea party with her stuffed animals. She clearly didn't like that Leonard suddenly entered her room as she showed that by throwing a small chair at him.

"Knock first before you enter my room!" She yelled. "What if I had been naked?"

"Nothing to see what I haven't seen before," Leonard said.

Hillary lifted her arm with her teapot, but suddenly put him back on the table. Good idea since it was made from stone and would probably break. But Leonard needed to watch out for the football she threw at his head.

"Let's move on," He said. "My parents bedroom, the bathroom, and this is my bedroom," Leonard continued.

Shea walked inside. It was almost as big as her bedroom at Aunt Yenna's house and also was with a music center, a television, and even a DVD player. There was also a desk, two bean bag chairs, a bookcase, and a lot of normal boy stuff with of course a bed.

"You have a nice room," Shea said.

"I'm glad you like it. Sorry about the mess. I should have cleaned," Leonard said.

"No. I don't mind. You need to be able to be yourself," Shea smiled.

"Dinner time!" Leonard's mother suddenly yelled.
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: Tour Through The House

choices: After All The Food Is Gone, They All Have Dessert
After Dinner, Shea And Leonard Relax With Each Other
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
Quickly, Hillary started to run downstairs to the kitchen as Shea and Leonard slowly followed. All in all, Shea seemed hungry, but she was still a little bit stuffed from eating the ice cream earlier. As she walked into the kitchen, the smell began to empower her youthful mind as she felt hungry again. Leonard sat Shea down as he sat next to her. Leonard's Mom sat down along with Leonard's Dad while Hillary sat next to him.

"Well, I made some mashed potatoes and gravy, Parmesan crusted chicken, homemade onion rings, corn bread, and some deep fried green beans. Dig in everyone! There's plenty for a village to eat," Leonard's Mom joked.

Shea looked on and noticed that there was a ton of food! It seemed that out of anyone, Hillary was getting the fattest results. However, Shea could tell that she would be next to join that group. Immediately, everyone grabbed as much food as they can, but Leonard's Dad looked at Shea's plate.

"I bet you can grab more than that," he said with a smile to Shea.

Shea's face turned red as she grabbed more, trying to impress Leonard's Dad and the rest of them. One thing that Shea noticed about the food was that it was all greasy, making it even more delicious in Shea's eyes.

"Shea, I saw that you had a bag of dirty clothes. I put all of it in the washing machine for you. I'll have it ready for you before you leave!" Leonard's Mom said.

"Well thanks! You didn't have to do that," Shea said.

"It's okay. Leonard told me that you had dirty clothes. I felt like it would help you to have them cleaned," Leonard's Mom said.

"Well, I appreciate it very much," Shea said with a smile in between bites.

"So tell us more about yourself, Shea," Leonard's Dad asked.

"Well, I used to live away from here, but my parents had to take a job that meant I had to be left here with my Aunt Yenna. I haven't been here for super long, but I am really liking it so far," Shea admitted.

"That's great! Are you getting to know people well?" Leonard's Mom asked.

"Definitely! And it's nice since school is starting up soon," Shea said.

"That's right! Well, hopefully you and Leonard will have the same teacher then. You probably will since it is a smaller town," Leonard's Dad said, making Shea grin.

"I hope as well," Shea said as she smiled at Leonard.

After a while, Shea had finished the food on her plate while talking with the family. The family had noticed that she had finished.

"Take more, Shea! Eat until it's all gone!" Leonard's Mom said with a grin.

Shea couldn't say no since the food was delicious and she was still feeling hungry, which would play a good part in her weight gain in the end.
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.title: The Dinner With Leonard's Family

choices: Leonard's Father Wants To Talk To Her On The Way
They Arrive At Aunt Yenna's House
1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
Shea looked out the window next to Leonard.

"That sunset is really beautiful," Shea said. "But I never really saw it. At least not for real. There was no sea where I lived. I hardly saw the sea," she said while looking out, seeing water.

After Dinner and dessert, Leonard took her to the attic. From there, they got on the roof and were now looking at the sunset. In the meantime, Leonard, of course, rubbed Shea's belly, who was very happy with that especially since she ate so much.

"So you're a real city girl?" Leonard said with a grin.

"Now I wouldn't say I'm a city girl," Shea said. "Sure, the place where I first lived had a lot of fun things, and fun people. I can't say no to that, but I really like living here, and also, all the other people. I'm really starting to like them," Shea admitted.

"Them and your belly," Leonard said.

She smiled when she heard that. She never had been such a thin girl wannabe who ate nothing but salad and mineral water to stay thin, who already screamed if she gained a single ounce, and who went to the gym every afternoon. She wasn't like that. She preferred eating a big, greasy, tasty hamburger and some cola for lunch, not caring if she gained two pound, and rather watched a good movie every afternoon while sitting on the couch with a big bag of chips. Yes, she really started to love her big belly and also loved the shape and how soft it was. It was just perfect in her eyes.

"I come here a lot, but always alone. Never with someone else. Not even Kathrine," Leonard said.

"Who is that?" Shea asked Leonard, a bit worried she might have some competition.

"That tall blond girl at the barbecue. She wore some sunglasses and wore a pink tank top. Kind of slender..."

Shea suddenly remembered, but didn't really put much attention to her. She was at least two years older. Her cup size was huge proof of that.

1452122211111121111222211122211211122121.content:
Shea walked to the scale put of her shoes and stepped on it. Normally she liked weighing herself but not today. The nurse looked at the number and whistled. She wrote the weight down.
Then the doctor came in. He smiled friendly and walked calmly over to her.

"Well you must be Shea. I'm doctor Smith. You don't have to worry this is all just a check up. You had check ups before right."

Shea nodded. The man seemed and sounded very friendly. So probably this would turn out all right

The doctor checked Shea height, reflexes, listen to her hart beat and some other things asked her some questions every now and then. Finally he was done.

"Polly could you call Miss Yenna in?" He asked the nurse.

The nurse walked out and returned a few seconds later with aunt Yenna.

"Weeeeel." The doctor started slowly. "Shea you seem to be perfectly healthy. However... your weight is really very high for a girl of your age and height. You're eleven but you seem pretty mature. You have a big chest for a eleven year old I guess you had you first period right?"

"Eh yeah. Short before I came here." Shea said.

"Right. I thought something like that. Girls with a high weight seem to mature faster. But like I said your weight is very high for a girl of your age and height. I got a copy from your old doctor. According to the information I got from him you seem to have gained a lot of weight in the past time. Now at the moment you're healthy. Lets make that clear. But if you gain more and more weight... well you might be less lucky. Do you do any kind of exercise?"

"No! Not really. Swimming sometimes, in the swimming pool of aunt Yenna."

"I see. Now you're in no danger. You're also to young for a crash diet. But I advice you to eat a bit more healthy. Perhaps some more vegetables and fruit. It's also healthier to cook food yourself than canned or jarred food. It also would be good for you to do some kind of exercise in a exercise group. Maybe that way you can lose some of that extra weight."

"What no if I don't want to lose weight?" Shea asked "I like being fat. I even want to become fatter."

"Really. Oh well that't unusual. Well in that case you may be happy you're still healthy. But I can't promise you that you stay healthy. But if you really want to do this make sure that you stay healthy. Try to train your muscles so they can support your weight. If you think something is wrong come straight to me. That's all I can say."

Shea and aunt Yenna tanked the doctor and walked out.

"I must admit he was pretty friendly. And maybe train my muscles a bit is't a bad idea."

"Yeah. But first you need to go to school."

"Yeah I know. But can we perhaps first get something to eat?"

145212221112.content:
"Hey, uh, do you want to go swimming? Apparently we have a pool in one of the rooms..." Shea asked nervously. The three local girls exchanged looks.
"Uh, I don't think any of us brought swimsuits..." said Jane awkwardly.
"Oh." Shea said, slightly put out. Then she perked up. "Don't worry, I brought a few. You can borrow some of mine!"
"Sure then." Chucking their paper plates into the bin, they followed her upstairs to her room and went inside. All of them but Sandy, who'd stayed there before, looked around at the beautiful room in amazement.
"Wow, Shea, you're lucky to have such a nice room. It's so much bigger than mine!" Said Emily enviously. Jane also looked impressed. Shea remembered that neither of their houses had been very big; she supposed that their families might not have all that much money.
Sandy, meanwhile, had been busy sampling a few of the candies from the various jars dotted around. She turned to Shea, smiling through a mouth of sugar.
"These are great Shea! I wish Yenna had had these out when I stayed here..." said the plump girl wistfully. "My parents probably told her not to though."
"Why would they do that?" asked Shea, confused.
"They think I'm too heavy." said Sandy, looking rather irked. "I keep telling them I don't weigh half as much as some of the kids round here, but apparently 5 pounds extra are just too much..."
Shea looked the larger girl up and down. Only five pounds extra seemed a little optimistic if you asked her... though the blonde girl probably wasn't that heavy, she was a good 4 inches shorter than her, and those extra pounds had spread themselves across her lower body. The result was a large, rounded belly, a large butt for an eleven year old, and soft thick thighs.
In the end, Shea shrugged noncommittally.
"Yeah..."
Emily tapped her on the shoulder.
"Hey, where are your swimsuits? I'm looking forward to this pool of yours!"
“Oh, yeah. They should be in one of my bags.” Shea moved over and started rummaging in a suitcase, quickly producing a few sets of swimwear. She counted them. “I’ve only got four pairs, so grab…” she took her favourite tankini before anyone else could “…what you want.”
The other three eleven year olds divided up the suits, quickly reaching an agreement. It was obvious they had known each other a long time, guessing what the others would want without a word. In the end, Sandy got a one-piece, Jane got a bikini and Emily took her spare tankini.
“Shall we, er, use the bathroom to change or…?”
Jane looked at her, bemused.
“We’re all girls here, aren’t we?” The slim girl began unbuttoning her shirt, revealing her bra underneath.
“O-okay then.” She said nervously. These girls really were welcoming; she’d only met them a few hours ago! Not wanting to be left behind as Sandy and Emily both started stripping down as well, she pulled off her shirt, feeling slightly self-conscious. She was all too aware of how much she’d eaten that evening, but although her belly was slightly swollen she wasn’t even close to chubby yet. If she remembered correctly, last time she’d weighed herself she’d been about 105 pounds.
She watched as Emily unbuttoned her shirt, revealing she was the only one of the four to not yet wear a bra. The blonde girl looked around at the other three, frustration written across her face as she noticed the same fact.
“You as well Shea? Damn it.” She looked down at her flat chest. “It’s not fair! Why do I have to wait when everyone else doesn’t?”
Both Jane and Sandy looked bemusedly at her. It was evident they’d had this conversation many times before.
“You’ll catch up soon, Emily, don’t worry.” Said Sandy reassuringly. Despite her chubby figure, little fat had settled on her chest. Still, it was more than Emily’s complete lack of breasts altogether.
“But both my sisters have them! Even Ellie, and she’s only nine! How’s that fair?” This was obviously a big deal to her, as evidenced by her bright red cheeks, but Jane spoke normally.
“Yeah, but Ellie’s pretty chubby and your older sister’s, well, older. You should be pleased you’re so slim; the boys’ll go crazy for you in a few years.”
Emily sighed.
“I suppose… maybe next year right?” she turned to Shea. “Sorry about that. Touchy subject you know?”
“Sorry…” Shea apologized awkwardly.
“Oh, don’t apologize, it’s not your fault.” The blonde girl looked slightly guilty. “I've made you feel bad at your own sleepover now, sorry.” She looked around, and saw that both Jane and Sandy were changed. “Come on, let’s hurry up and get ready. I’ll make it up to you later, okay?”
They both quickly slipped into their swimsuits and set out down the corridor, following the other two girls. Shea reflected idly on how strange it was to be lead around her own home, but it made sense as Jane knew the building better than she did. As she walked, she kept adjusting her tankini bottom. It was a bit tighter than she remembered, the fabric stretched taught under her bloated belly, but at least it fit her better than Emily’s did; the waistband was quite loose around the skinny girl’s narrow waist, constantly threatening to fall down.
She glanced at Jane, and was impressed by how good the redhead looked in her borrowed bikini. Shea’s grandmother had bought it for her, God knows why, but the old woman had bought one that was considerably too small in the waist. By luck, it fitted the athletic girl beautifully, both top and bottom.
Sandy’s costume, on the other hand, didn't fit quite as perfectly; the one piece hadn't been worn in at least a year, when Shea had been a bit slimmer than she was now, and was very tight on the plump blonde, clinging to her bulging form like a second skin, evidently straining the fabric across her belly and chest.
Staring at the larger girl’s jiggling backside, Shea could only hope that the poor thing would survive the ordeal.

145231.content:
A week had passed by since Shea began living with her Aunt Yenna, and despite her protesting against it at first, by now she almost wanted to stay there! her aunt's hospitality was almost unmatched, and only her food was better. For Shea, each bite got better and tastier than the last. Her chicken was succulent and juicy, her pizzas were cheesy and bursting with flavour, and her fries were golden and crisp. The only thing that topped that was her desserts; the rich delicious cakes, the soft cool ice cream, the flavourful chocolate.
Shea just couldn't get enough of her aunt's cooking.
Literally. She was becoming full-blown addicted to the food set in front of her. She'd eat, eat, and eat, then ask for more. She even asked frequently if she could lick the melted chocolate from the bowl! And of course her dear Aunt Yenna didn't mind her new eating habits at all; in fact she welcomed them. "Young ones like you still need a lot to grow," she'd say.
Of course she meant in age, but for Shea that growth was outward. In only a week she'd already shown signs of plumping up; her pot belly was now starting to slightly hang over her waist, which had expanded by just a few inches. Her thighs had expanded too, nearly touching together, and you could see a double chin beginning to form just between her cheeks, which were also starting to plump up. Even her backside was a bit bigger.

Shea was oblivious to this of course. All she wanted was her aunt's food, and a lot of it.

One morning, Shea rose up from her bed, not hearing the small creak of relief coming from it. She gave a quiet yawn, stretching her arms up and causing her sleeping vest to ride up and her rounder tummy to show. The groggy girl plodded to the bathroom, washed herself up (not noticing her slightly plumped up face) and returned to her room without brushing her teeth, so's to not spoil the flavour of her aunt's amazing food. She could always brush after.
She stood at the mirror and brushed her long brown hair, getting it into its naturally wavy style.
Now to dress, Shea checked off in her mind. She grabbed a pair of jeans and stepped into them, grunting softly as she slightly wiggled her wider hips to slip them up to her waist and button them up. They felt a bit tighter, she noted. She then grabbed a clean red t-shirt and slipped it over her head and onto herself, tugging it down a bit.
Shea looked in the mirror with a little bit of concern growing; her tummy was peeking out a bit from under her shirt, which looked a bit tight.
Maybe I've been...eating a bit too much? She thought to herself warily. Maybe she could check her weight in the bathroom before she went down for breakfast.
And speaking of breakfast, at that very moment a succulent smell flowed right into the girl's nostrils, her eyes widening at what she could smell; sausages, eggs, bacon, toast, everything!
Her rounder tummy gave out a desperate rumble, begging Shea to go down there ASAP and feed it, now.
